ba balume ba mu nzubu ya batatuabu bavua: Mikaele, Meshulama, Sheba, Yolai, Yakana, Zia, ne Ebê, bonso muanda mutekete.

26 Nunku Nzambi wa Isalele wakasonsola lungenyi lua Pula mukalenge wa Ashû+ (mmumue ne: Tigelata-pilenesê+ wa mu Ashû) ke yeye kukuata bena Lubena, bena Gada, ne tshitupa tshia tshisa tshia Manashe, kuyaye nabu ku Halaha, ku Habô, ku Hala, ne ku musulu wa Gozana,+ miaba idibu too ne lelu.

BUALU BUDIBU BAMANYISHA PA BULOBA BUJIMA
Bitendelelu bia dishima mbitendelelu kayi? Bitu bikutonda pautu umvua ne: bamue bantu mbenze malu mabi mu dîna dia bitendelelu biabu anyi? Utu umvua bibi pautu umona bantu batu badiamba mudibu bena nzambi badibueja mu mvita ne mu malu a terorisme anyi a ba nguluba wa tshinyangu badi bashipangana anyi bakosangana mishiku ne babakosayi anyi? Bitendelelu bidi bidibueja mu malu mabi a bungi nunku bua tshinyi?
Anu bitendelelu bia dishima ke bitu bidibuejakaja 
... 
e pa nyama munene mukuate buôwa. Nyama eu udi ne mitu 7 ne nsengu 10. (Buakabuluibua 17:1-4) Ndumba eu nnganyi? Bible udi wamba ne: udi ukokesha ‘ku mutu kua bakalenge ba pa buloba.’ Mmuvuale bilamba bikunzubile, udi ne musenga wa manananshi, ne udi ne bubanji bupite bungi. Udi kabidi ne malu a bademon adiye ‘udinga nawu bantu ba mu bisamba bionso.’ (Buakabuluibua 17:18; 18:12, 13, 23) Bible udi utuambuluisha bua kuamba ne: ndumba eu mbitendelelu bionso bia dishima bidi pa buloba. Nanku, ki ntsh
...
anda muaba kansanga to.”—Holocaust Politics.
Bantemu ba Yehowa badi balongesha malu adi mu Bible ne baenza kabidi. Badi mu matunga 235. Tudi tukusengelela bua ulombe Bantemu bua bakulongeshe malu adi Nzambi ulomba bua kumutendelela mushindu udiye musue. Ke dîba dia kukeba tshia kuenza edi! Kuindidi malaba to! Bitendelelu bia dishima bikadi pa kufua!—Sefanya 2:2, 3.
* Udi mua kupeta malu a bungi pa tshilumbu etshi mu mukanda wa Bantemu ba Yehowa wa Buakabuluibua—Nkomenu wabu munene ukadi pabuipi!

Pavua Yezu ufuma mu Peleya, wakafika ku tshibuelelu tshia Betania, musoko uvua mu kilometre mitue ku 3 ku est kua Yelushalema. Mâta ne Mariya bana babu ne Lazalo badi badila bua mudi Lazalo ufuma ku difua. Bantu ba bungi mbalue kubasamba.
Pashishe muntu kampanda wakambila Mâta ne: Yezu ukavua pabuipi, nunku Mâta wakaya lubilu bua kutuilangana nende. Mâta wakambila Yezu ne: yeye ne muanabu bavua pamuapa badiambila munkatshi mua matuku anayi ne: “Mukalenge, bu wewe muikalapu, muanetu kavua mua kuf
... 
 neapetulule muoyo; ne muntu yonso udi ne muoyo ne uleja ditabuja kundi, kakufua nansha kakese.”—Yone 11:25, 26.
Yezu kena usua kuamba ne: bayidi bende bavua ne muoyo tshikondo atshi kabavua ne bua kufua to. Nansha yeye uvua ne bua kufua anu muvuaye muambile bapostolo bende. (Matayi 16:21; 17:22, 23) Yezu uvua ushindika ne: kuleja ditabuja kudiye kudi mua kufikisha ku muoyo wa kashidi. Bantu ba bungi nebapete muoyo eu ku diambuluisha dia dibishibua ku lufu. Kadi bena lulamatu bikale ne muoyo ku 
...
ne: uvua uya ku lukita lua Lazalo.
Kadi Mariya wakaya kudi Yezu, kudielaye ku makasa ende wenda udila ne kuambululaye mêyi a muanabu wamba ne: “Mukalenge, bu wewe muikalapu, muanetu kavua mua kufua to.” Bu muvua Yezu mumone Mariya ne misumba ya bantu badila, wakashikunkila, kupampakanaye ne kupuekeshaye too ne binsonji. Bualu ebu buakalenga bantu bavua babumone ku muoyo bikole. Kadi bamue bakebeja ne: ‘Yezu eu uvua mutabeje mêsu a mpofu kavuaku mua kuenza bua muntu eu kafu anyi?’—Yone 11:32, 37.

TSHIBUMBA TSHIA NSENTEDI (TSHIA KULONGA) Ngondo 5 2017
Mu nimero eu mudi biena-bualu bua kulonga kutuadijila mu dia 3-30/7/2017.
Biwikala muledi udi musombele mu ditunga dienyi, mmunyi muudi mua kupetesha bana bebe mpunga mutambe buimpe wa kumanya malu a Yehowa? Mmunyi mudi bantu bakuabu mua kuambuluisha?
LIFE STORY
Walter Markin kena mua kuakula to, kadi udi ne nsombelu wa disanka ne malu mimpe bidiye mupete mu dienzela Yehowa Nzambi mudimu.
Bamue bena Kristo ba mu bidimu lukama bia kumpala bakalekela dinanga dia kumpala divuabu nadi. Ntshinyi tshidi mua kutuambuluisha bua kulama dinanga dietu dia Yehowa dikole?
FROM OUR ARCHIVES
Pakajika mpungilu wa Balongi ba Bible mu 1922, mmunyi muvuabu batumikile mubelu wa ‘kumayisha Mukalenge ne Bukalenge buende’?

Mu dia Matuku dikumi ni muanda mutekete dia ngondo wa tshiteme, ministre wa malu a ngumu Patrick Muyaya, udi ulomba bena Kongre bua kuluangana bua kulombola mudimu wa bamanyishi mu ditunga dia Congo biakane. Mfumu wa malu a dimanyisha wakabikidisha bemanyishi bonso bua kuenza mudimu muimpe bua kuakula bua mushindu muimpe wa kuenza mudimu wa dipatula mikanda mu Congo-Kinshasa.
Mu muyuki wende kumpala kua bamfumu ba mbulamatadi ne ba bampulushi, ne bafundi ba bikandakanda, ministre wa malu a ngumu
... 
, tudi mua kupingaja malu a kale mu bianza bietu, ne nuenu nudi mua kupingana mu mudimu wenu wa difunda malu a kale a lelu. Ke tshikondo tshia nuenu kuenza mudimu wenu wa butoke bua bantu”, ke muvua Patrick Muyaya muambile bamanyishi ba mpungilu eu.
Ngamba-malu wa mbulamatadi wakanyisha mushindu uvua Mfumu wa ditunga ulonda ngenyi ya mu bikandakanda. “Padiye uteleja bimanyishilu bia malu a mu bikandakanda, udi uleja dituku dionso ne bienzedi biende ne: demokrasi udi ne muoyo mu Afrike.
Etshi nts
...
u wa tshibambalu tshia malu a ngumu tshia Congo wamba.
Katupa kîpi kumpala kua muyuki eu, mulombodi wa tshitupa tshîpi wa UNPC wakela kalumbandi bua dikuatshisha ne buludiki bua Muena-mpala Muyaya mu dienza dia bisangilu ebi, bidiye umona bu amue malu adibu balombe kudi bena-mpuilu.
Badi babikila mpungilu eu ne: “Kongrese wa Disanka ne Dibishibua ku lufu”. Bisangilu ebi bia matuku asatu nebisake bamanyishi ba malu a mu mpungilu eu bua kuenza komite mupiamupia bua kulombola tshibambalu etshi.

Biangata mu tshibejibeji tshia : Tshondo
13 mars 2008
Bukalenga bonso wabudia ne bantu e nanku buakulengeleela. Mukalenga wa baantu, baantu wa mukalenga. Mukalenge katu ukuata mudimu nkayende, utu ne badi bamutua nyama ku mikolo. Bine abo ke boobo aba:
• Muadiamvita : Udi mfumu wa tshiluilu tshia mvita. Ulamisha bulongame mu ditunga.
• Kalala : Udi tshindonda tshia Muadiamvita. Uludika tshiluilu : ufileela kumpata kwa lusengenge lua mvita bwa kuleeja pa kuyila ne budimu buvule bua kuepela njiwu, ujingulula luseke ludi baluishi bavuila, bungi buabo ne bukole buabo.
•... [Lire la suite]

Dibaka dia tshiamu
Ba bidima ba mu Kenya badi batuleja mua kuenza nzubu ne biamua bipepele. Bu mudi tululu katuyi ikuata luanga anyi kayiyi ikuata kapepe bua ikale mupuwe, idi itata bikole mu munya mukole. Nanku mbimpe kuteka tshiamu etshi mu mîdima. Kuibaka nzubu mubandishibue kudi kuambuluisha bua kukuba tululu ku tuishi ne kuenza bua tushipu tua nyema tuele panshi. Bu mudi tuminyinyi tudi tuenza mudimu ne biamu bia mupuya mukole mua kunyanga bintu bidi bienza mudimu ne biamu bia mupuya mukole, tuenze bua tuishi etu tuosheka ka-rubber kakese ne tupeshawu mukele. Tudi kabidi mua kubutula tuzubu tua tuishi tutu ku tshiibi tshia nzubu. Malu aa ne makuabu adi mua kukuambuluisha bua kulama tululu bimpe, bualu ebu budi buenda buvula ne budi mua kukupetesha makuta a bungi.

DÎBA divua dikumbane dia kuenza tshisangilu tshia mushinga mukole mu Yelushalema. Mukalenge Davidi wakabikila banene, tupita ne bena bukitu bende bonso. Bavua ne disanka dia kuteleja dimanyisha dia pa buadi. Yehowa uvua mupeshe Solomo muana wa Davidi mudimu wa kuibaka muaba wa pa buawu wa kutendelela Nzambi mulelela. Nzambi uvua mupeshe mukalenge wa kale wa Isalele plan wa mua kuibaka muaba eu ne yeye kumupesha Solomo. Davidi kuambaye ne: “Mudimu eu udi munene; bualu bua mbalasa eu kena wa muntu
... 
 bakadifidila bintu biabu; bualu bua bakafila bintu biabu ne mitshima mitoke kudi Yehowa.’—1 Kul. 29:9.
Bidimu nkama ya bungi pashishe, Yehowa wakenza tshintu kampanda tshinene tshipite ntempelo. Wakajadika ntempelo munene wa mu nyuma, mbuena kuamba ne: ndongoluelu udiye muenze bua bantu kusemena kudiye bua kumutendelela ku diambuluisha dia mulambu wa Yezu. (Eb. 9:11, 12) Mmunyi mudi Yehowa wambuluisha bantu bua kulengejanganabu nende lelu? Nku diambuluisha dia mudimu wetu wa kuvuija bantu bayid
...
ungilu. Kuenaku witaba ne: mudimu wetu wa kuyisha lumu luimpe mmudimu munene udi ne difutu anyi?—Mat. 24:14.
Bu mudi bantu ba Nzambi banange Nzambi ne bantu nabu ne bu mudi mudimu wa kuyisha Bukalenge muikale wa kuenza ne mitalu, bidi bibasaka bua ‘kulua ne dipa mu tshianza bua kupesha Yehowa’ pa kufila mapa a budisuile. Bidi bienza disanka bua ‘kutumbisha Yehowa ne biuma’ bietu ne bua kumona mudibu benza mudimu ne biuma ebi bimpe ne meji bua kuenza mudimu munene wa katshia ne katshia.—Nsu. 3:9.

Mmunyi mutu Nzambi umona muoyo?
Mmunyi mutu Nzambi umona ditula dia mafu?
Mmunyi mutudi mua kunemeka muoyo?
MUPROFETE Yelemiya wakamba ne: “Yehowa udi Nzambi wa bushuwa; yeye udi Nzambi wa muoyo.” (Yelemiya 10:10) Yehowa Nzambi udi kabidi Mufuki wa bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo. Bifukibua bia mu diulu biakamuambila ne: “Wewe wakafuka bintu bionso, ne bualu bua disua diebe biakadiku, ne biakafukibua.” (Buakabuluibua 4:11) Mukalenge Davidi wakatumbisha Nzambi wamba ne: “Wewe udi mpokolo wa muoyo.” (M
... 
wa wakaleja patoke ne: basadidi bende bavua mua kudia munyinyi kadi kubenga kudia mashi. Bavua ne bua kupongolola mashi panshi, mbuena kuamba ne: kupingajila Nzambi muoyo wa nyama.
12 Bena Kristo badi ne mukenji wa muomumue. Bapostolo ne bantu bakuabu bavua balombola bayidi ba kumpala ba Yezu bakadisangisha bua kumona mikenji ivua bisumbu bionso bia bena Kristo ne bua kulonda. Bakamba ne: ‘Nyuma muimpe wakamona, ne tuetu kabidi ne: Ki mbimpe bua kunutekela bunga bujitu, anu malu atudi nawu bualu
...
u?
13. Leja bua tshinyi mukenji wa kulekela mashi udi umvuija kabidi kubenga kuedibua mashi.
14, 15. Baminganga bobu bambe ne: bidi bikengela kuela muena Kristo mashi, neenze tshinyi, ne mbua tshinyi?
16. Basadidi ba Nzambi mbadisuike bua kuenza tshinyi pa bidi bitangila mashi?
17. Mu Isalele wa kale, mmudimu kayi umuepele wa mashi uvua Yehowa Nzambi witaba?
18. Mmasanka kayi atudi tupeta ku diambuluisha dia mashi a Yezu?
19. Tudi ne bua kuenza tshinyi bua ‘kubingishibua ku mashi a bantu bonso’?

u webe kavua muye muaba nansha umue to.”+
26 Elisha wakamuambila ne: “Muoyo wanyi kawuvua nebe kuntu aku pavua muntu au mutuluke mu ditempu diende bua kusambakena nebe anyi? Edi ndîba dia kuitaba arjan, peshi kuitaba bilamba, madimi a mitshi ya olive, madimi a tumuma tua mvinyo, mikoko, ngombe, bena mudimu balume peshi bena mudimu bakaji anyi?+
27 Nunku nsudi ya Nâmana+ neyikulamate wewe ne ndelanganyi yebe bua kashidi.” Diakamue wakumbuka kumpala kuende muikale muena nsudi, mutoke anu bu neje.+

Ndaga itshi ya longesele Yesu jidi mumonesa egi gula tudi mukamba guhuima nu phangi’etu, Nzambi wajiya gutshigina gukombelela guetu?

Mu lusugu lua gubatijiwa guetu, tuana gutshigina muhitu wa Yesu wa gukhala alandudi enji, ngenyi tuana gutshigina inemo yakola nu tuana gusendesa gukalagala mudimo wakola. Uvi gukalagala ngenyi guana gutuhana gikhesa.

Mukelenge Yesu : midimu yandi
Tumuki ku dimona imue nseke ya butumbi bua bumuntu bua Kilisto (shap. 1) ne nseke mikuabu ya butumbi bua mudimu wende ku mutshi mutshiamakane (shap. 2). Ku matumbi ende onso aa; kudi kudiakaja makuabu matumbi a mudimu udiye ukuata katataka, ne a mu matuku alualua.
3.1 Mukelenge bu muakuidi munene, udi wenza tshinyi?
Mukelenge wetu Yesu udi muakuidi mutambe bunene, ne mu ngikadilu eu, udi utuakuila (Lom. 8. 34 ne Ebel. 7. 25. 26). Muakuidi wetu munene udi mukumbane b
... 
idimu 1000 : "Ne bobo bakikala ne muoyo, ne bakakokesha ne Kilisto bidimu tshinunu" (Buak. 20. 4). Ke buatshinyi bukelengelu bulualua ebu budi bubikidibua ne "millenium" (bidimu tshinunu).
3.6 Nebuikale mushindu kayi (bukelenge bua bidimu tshinunu)?
Kilisto neakokeshe mu ditalala ne mu buakane (Yesh. 11. 3, 5) ne mu tshijila (Zak. 14. 20, 21). Buloba nebusukudibue mu mushindu wa ne, Yeshayi udi mua kuakula bua bualu buabu ne "buloba bupiabupia" (Yesh. 65. 17; 66. 22). Diunvuangana ne buobumue ne
...
gu mikuabu badi bafunda "chef", misangu mikuabu bafunda "tete" (mutu); kadi mu mifundu ya ku tshibangidilu kudi anu muaku umue bua yonso ibidi. Kilisto udi nfumu anyi (mutu) mu mishindu mishilangane. Udi nfumu…
- ... pankayende wa mulume yonso (1 Kol. 11)
- ... bua buloba bujima: Pa bintu bionso (Efes. 1. 23).
- ... ku mubidi: wa Ekelezia (Efes. 1. 23; 5. 23; Kolos. 1. 18).
Bukelenge bua Kilisto budi busuikakaja ku bukokeshi buende kudi bena mudimu anyi bapika, anyi kudi muena kuitabuja muntu ne

RDC: Mulombodi Wa Congo central mufila programme Wa londapu
Ndiangata programe wa malu a makanda a mubidi bu bualu buetu Tudi tuleja ne: tudi badisuike bonso bua kuakaja malu a ditunga dia Kongo Central.
Ke bualu kayi, Mulombodi wa LED, Guy-Didier KINTAMBU wakenza bua bantu ba mu tshitupa etshi tshia ditunga, nangananga bakaji, bitabe mmuenenu wa mulombodi wa ditunga eu, udi utangila kufila luondapu lua mushinga mukese.
Bualu ebu buakenzeka mu tshitupa tshia difesto dia dituku dia buloba bujima dia kuluangana bua bukenji bua bakaji.
Dipa dimpe dia kudi Guy-Didier KINTAMBU bua bakaji bonso ba mu Mbanza-Ngungu.
Muakuidi munene wa LED, Guy-Dier KINTAMBU wakenza mudimu ne mpunga eu bua kupesha bantu ba bungi ba muaba au bintu bia dienza nabi mudimu bu mudi: biamu bia kumona nabi bintu bikese (microscopes), biamu bia dienza nabi mudimu (kits) ne bintu bikuabu bia luondapu. Bakapesha kabidi bantu makuta bua kufuta makuta a bakaji bavua balele bana ne a bamue bantu bavua kabayi ne mushindu wa kuenza mudimu.
Muena malu a mpetu nwa mu ditunga eu uvua muleja dinanga diende dia bakuabu bantu ba kuluseka Wa congo , wakalaya bua kuambuluisha bena manga aba ne bintu bia matuku etu aa.
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

Dituku diakumpala Dia ngondo wa tshiteme tshidimu tshia 2024, Jesus noel shek wakapesha Gouvena wa Kinshasa, Daniel BUMBA, bipeta bia tshisangilu tshia dikonkonona mikenji ya malu a mpetu ya tshimenga ne dilongolola dia mukanda wa mpetu wa tshidimu tshia 2024. Tshivua tshipatshila tshia tshisangilu etshi tshivua tshienzeka bua kukonkonona malu a mpetu ya kale ne kupingaja amue malu bua kuambuluisha mbulamatadi wa provense bua kukumbaja programe wende wa mudimi .
Mukokeshi, pamue ne Muambuluishi wa Mukokeshi ne bamfumu bakuabu ba mbulamatadi, bakaleja disanka diabu bua mushindu uvuabu balongolole bua kufila makuta a bungi mu mushindu wa kuyisha tshimenga Kumpala.
Gloire Kabongo

Tala mona wayala udi ha foto. Mona muene, udi hakhenji, udi guvua woma! Wadivile kale luholo luene ba?— Muthu wagasue wajiya guvua woma mu matangua ako. Biblia yazuelela mafuta a Yehowa ako avile woma nu gikenene. Mumoshi jina dienji Eliya. Tute gale lumene luenji.
Eliya wakhadile gu Isalele, ivo yavula gutuama Yesu avalewe. Fumu mumoshi wa Isalele jina dienji Ahaba, akhadilego gukombelela Yehowa Nzambi. Ahaba nu mukaji’enji, Yezabele, akhadile gukombelela nzambi wamambo, jina dienji Baala. Ana 
... 
—
Eliya walengele gualeha! Wayile gudisuega mu temu. Mukunda n’atshi Eliya akalegele luholo luene?— Wavile woma. Uvi Eliya akhadileko naye guvua woma ndo. Mukunda n’atshi? Handaka wajiyile egi Yehowa wajiya gumukuatesa. Yehowa wakhadi wamonesa gale ngolo j’enji gudi Eliya. Lusugu lumoshi, Yehowa wavile gutoga gua Eliya, tshiya tuejile gosa uu nu ha mavu. Yehowa wakhadile naye gukuatesa luko Eliya!
Tangua Eliya akhadile mosh’a seso, Yehowa wamuhudile egi: ‘Itshi udi mukalagala haha?’ Eliya wa vut
...
 egi: ‘Ishiko matshidia ndo. Gudi athu ako 7 000 ana gungukombelela. Khala nu ngolo. Ngudi nu mudimo wavula wa guguhana!’ Watangiza egi Eliya wasuangulugile guvua mbimbi yene ba?—
Mulonga wabuidile Eliya wajiya gugulongesa itshi?— Ushiko naye guvua gikenene nga woma ndo. Udi nu mafuta ana guzumba Yehowa nu ana guguzumba. Jehowa udi nu ngolo jiavula, wajiya gugukuatesa tangua diagasue! Wasuanguluga hagujiya egi ushiko hakhaye ndo?—

Patudi bananga bakuabo bumudi Musungidi mubananga, tudi basue kubambuluishe bu mua kenzaye. Bu mulami wa mikoku muimpe, yeye udi tshilejelu tshijalame tshia mudimu wa buambi.
Kulongela ku buambi buetu, bidi bikala bia mushinga bua kuvuluka ne tshisumi tshienda tshia kunanga, kukolesha, kuambuluisha ne kubenesha bivua ne kipatshila ka kuandamuna ku majinga musangu umue. Ne uvua mumanye majinga abu a matuku onso ne uvua ne luse pa makenga abu a diambedi. Ne wa kondopa, kudisha, kufuila luse, ne ku
... 
ulondi wa mukenji wa kumpala ne ikale anu ukumbaja mushinga wa bienzedi bia mudimu.”1
Pakenzaye muyuki wenda wa kumpala bu Muimanyinyi wa Ekelezia, Muimanyinyi Russell M. Nelson wakamba ne; “Tushalayi balamata munjila wa tshipungidi.” Ku dienza ne dilama dia bipungidi “ne kunzulula tshîbi kudi mabenesha onso a mu nyuma adi mikala koku.”2
Tuetu bu Basantu ba Matuku a Ndekelu, tudi bikala babatijibua, bajadikibua ne bapeta dipa dia Nyuma Muimpa. Bidimba bia baluma bijalama bidi bipeta buakuidi. Tu
...
 ne ubujalamija bimpa. Ikala ne lutulu, tshisumi, ne dikima. Dishintuluka didi mua kuangata mutantshi.
Angata ne mushinga mishindu idi tshisumi tshieba tshia busambi—mu bula ne mu butshiama bionso bidi—ne kuambuluisha bakuabo bua kukudimuna mitshima yabo ne kuikala bafuanangane ne Musungidi.

Tudi naye gulandula khadilo dia Yeshaya dia gudihana nu mutshima wagasue. Wamonesele gutshigina, enji watumagele mudimo wamuhanele Nzambi ikhale muene gakhalelego mujiya ndaga jiagasue jidi mutalela mudimo wene. (Yesh 6:8) Wajiya gulonda ndaga jia lujingu luaye ha gula egi uye ulongese mbimbi ya Nzambi ha fundo didi diago nu funu ya alongeshi a Ufumu? (Ngi 110:3) Yadiago, idi nu funu egi “tutange ndando” gutuama dia guya fundo diene. (Luka 14:27, 28) Uvi, tshigina nu mutshima umoshi ha gumona lamba mukunda nu mudimo wa gulongesa mbimbi ya Nzambi. (Mat 8:20; Mako 10:28-30) Luholo tuayimonyi mu video Déménager là où il y a besoin de renfort, gubonga tuana guheta mu mudimo wa Yehowa guabalega malamba tuana gutagana nawo mu mudimo wene.
GUNGIMA DIA GUTALA VIDEO, HANA MVUTU GU MIHU EYI:
Ndaga jitshi jiakalegele enya fami ya phangi Williams ha gula aye mulongesa mbimbi ya Nzambi gu Équateur?
Ndaga jitshi atalele tangua akhalele mutomba fundo dia guya gulongesa mbimbi ya Nzambi?
Gubonga gutshi ahetele?
Fundo ditshi wajiya gumona ndaga jiavula jidi mutalela fundo didi diago nu funu ya alongeshi a Ufumu?
MU GUKOMBELELA GUENU GUA MU FAMI GUA PHOSO IDI MUZA, TALELENU MIHU EYI YALANDULA:
Luholo lutshi fami yetu yajiya gulongesa muavula mbimbi ya Nzambi? (km-F 8/11 diyiji 4-6)
Gula tushigo nu luholo lua guya gulongesa fundo didi diago nu funu ya alongeshi, ndaga jitshi tuajiya gukalagala ha gukuatesa hungu dietu? (w16.03-F diyiji 23-25)

MUDIMU WA KU BETELE Bambi ba lumu luimpe bakadi batambule badi ne bidimu 35 anyi muinshi badi basue kuya kuenza mudimu ku Betele, nebadilongolole bua kubuela mu tshisangilu tshienzabu mu Ditanu mu mapingaja. Nebamanyishe dîba ne muaba wenzekelatshi.
KALASA KA BAMANYISHI BA BUKALENGE Bampanda-njila badi ne bidimu 23 too ne 65 badi basue kuvudija mudimu wabu mbalombibue bua kubuela mu tshisangilu tshia badi basue kubuela mu Kalasa ka Bamanyishi ba Bukalenge tshienzeka mu Dia lumi
... 
kulua ne tshilamba tshia kudikupula natshi mâyi ne bilamba bia kumutuabu nabi mu mâyi bidi biakanyine.
BENA BUDISUILE Wewe musue kuambuluisha mu mpungilu bu muena budisuile, suaku uye kudimanyisha ku Tshibambalu tshia malu a kumanya ne mudimu wa budisuile.
BINTU BIANGULA Nudi ne bua kuya ne bintu bionso biangula ku Tshibambalu tshia bintu biangula. Wewe mujimije tshintu, mbimpe uye kutshikeba ku tshibambalu etshi. Nudi kabidi ne bua kufila bana badi bajimine ku tshibambalu etshi. Kadi muaba eu k
...
u eu wenzekela. Tudi ne dianyisha divule bua mfranga yonso inudi nufila. Kasumbu Kaludiki kadi kanuela tuasakidila bua mushindu unudi nukuatshisha mudimu wa Bukalenge.
MIABA YA KUSOMBA Suaku wangate bakuabu ne mushinga. Umanye ne: anu muena mu dîku dienu, muntu unudi bende nende pamue, unudi basombele nende kumbelu kumue, anyi unudi nulonga nende Bible mpindieu ke uudi mua kukuatshila muaba. Kuteki bintu pa miaba iudi kuyi mulamine bantu to.

Panyima pa dipatuka mu Babilona, dîna dia ngondo muitanu mu kalandriye ka tshijila ka bena Yuda ne dia ngondo wa 11 mu kalandriye kavua kakayi ka bena Yuda. Uvua utuadija munkatshi mua ngondo wa 7 uya too ne mua ngondo wa 8. Ki mbatele dîna edi mu Bible to; badi bakula bua bualu buende anu bu “ngondo muitanu” patupu. (Nom 33:38; Ezl 7:9)—Tang. Tshis. B15.

... 
me mukulumpe ku bana bonso ba tatu (kabiyi bua muanabute wa mamu). Ku kale, muanabute wa balume uvua ne muaba wa mushinga mu dîku ne bavua bamupesha mudimu wa kulombola dîku pavua tatu ufua. Muaku eu uvua kabidi uleja muana mulume wa kumpala wa nyama, imue misangu bavua bamubikila ne: “muanabute.”—Eks 11:5; 13:12; Gen 25:33; Kls 1:15.

Dîna dia ntuadijilu dia ngondo muibidi mu kalandriye ka tshijila ka bena Yuda ne dia ngondo wa 8 mu kalandriye kavua kakayi ka bena Yuda. Uvua utuadija munkatshi mua ngondo muinayi uya too ne mua ngondo muitanu. Badi bamubikila ne: Iyâ mu Talmud wa bena Yuda ne mu mikanda mikuabu ya panyima pa dikuatshibua mu Babilona. (1Bk 6:37)—Tang. Tshis. B15.

Bia dibungama, pa buloba bujima, bantu ba bungi kabena balua mu dienza masungula to. Ndekelu wa bionso, demokrasi ke udi upeta”.

Samuel * wa mu Kenya udi wamba ne: “Mvua munayi munene wa manaya a makuta. Mvua nsambila bua kupeta makuta a bungi, kadi tshitu anu muanji kuapeta to.”
Teresa wa mu Philipines udi wamba ne: “Mu kalasa, mudimu wetu uvua anu wa kuambulula masambila makuata ku muoyo avuabu batulongesha.”
Magdalene wa mu Ghana udi wamba ne: “Ntu nsambila pandi mu ntatu. Ntu nsambila bua Nzambi amfuile luse bua mpekatu yanyi ne bua ngikale muena Kristo muimpe.”
Malu adi Samuel, Teresa ne Magdalene bambe aa adi aleja 
... 
ata mateta mu kalasa anyi basambila bua tshisumbu tshiabu tshia manaya tshitshimune, bua kupeta bulombodi bua Nzambi mu dîku anyi bua malu makuabu a bungi, bantu ba bungi batu anu basue kusambila. Makebulula adi aleja ne: nansha bamue bantu bobu kabayi baya mu tshitendelelu kampanda, batu anu ne tshibidilu tshia kusambila.
Utuku pebe usambila anyi? Biobi nanku, utu usambila bua malu kayi? Nansha wewe ne tshibidilu tshia kusambila anyi kuyi natshi, udi mua kudiebeja ne: ‘Kusambila kudiku ne mushi
...
balombodi ba malu a luondapu badi ne mmuenenu wa muomumue, badi bamba mudi kusambila kuikale “umue mushindu wa luondapu.” Bantu batuku bamona disambila anu bu bualu bua pa tshibidilu patupu anyi? Peshi batu bapeta disulakana kampanda padibu basambila?
Kadi Bible yeye udi uleja mudi disambila dipite luondapu kampanda kule ne kule. Udi utuambila ne: kudi muntu utu uteleja masambila adi bantu benza mu mushindu muimpe ne bua malu adi makane. Mbulelela anyi? Tukonkononayi tshidi tshitujadikila nanku.

Udiku mumanye Bukalenge butudi tuakuila muaba eu anyi?— Mmuomu, m’Bukalenge bua Nzambi, buikala mua kuvuija buloba ebu mparadizu. Udiku musue kumanya malu a bungi a Bukalenge ebu anyi?—
Bukalenge buonso ebu butu ne mfumuabu. Mukalenge utu ulombola bantu ba muaba udiye. Udiku mumanye Mukalenge wa Bukalenge bua Nzambi anyi?— Mukalenge au ke Yezu Kristo. Mmusombele mu diulu. Ukadi pa kukokesha bantu bonso ba pa buloba. Udiku mumone ne: pikala Yezu mua kukokesha buloba bujima, netuikale ne disanka anyi?—
Ntshinyi tshiudi muindile ne muoyo kulu kulu mu Mparadizu?
Netuikale ne disanka kadiyi kuamba! Mu Mparadizu, bantu kabakuluishangana anyi kuelangana kabidi mvita to. Muntu yonso neikale munange muinende. Muntu nansha umue kakusama anyi kufua to. Mpofu neitabale, mpudi-matshi neyumvue ne balema nebanyeme ne nebatumpike. Muntu yonso neikale ne biakudia bungi tshianana. Nekuikale diumvuangana pankatshi pa nyama yoyi nkayayi ne pankatshi payi ne bantu. Bantu bakadi bafue nebabike. Ba bungi ba ku bantu balume ne bantu bakaji baudi mulonge malu abu mu broshire eu bu mudi: Lebeka, Lahaba, Davidi ne Eliya nebabike pabu. Udiku musue kumonangana nabu pikalabu mua kubika anyi?—
Yehowa mmukunange ne mmusue bua wikale ne disanka. Wewe utungunuka ne kulonga malu ende, umutumikila, newikale ne muoyo wa kashidi mu mparadizu mulengeja bimpe. Ke tshiudi musue anyi?—

Pamvua ne bidimu 17 mvua ne ntatu ne majinga a muomumue ne bansonga bakuabu. Mvua musue kudisangisha ne balunda banyi bua kuowela mu mâyi ne kunaya ndundu. Kadi, dimue dituku dilolo nsomebelu wanyi wakashintuluka mu mupodi wa dîsu. Kukadi kupite bidimu bitue ku 30, mvua mupete njiwu ne moto mibi mitambe ivua minshiye mutekete kumbukila anu ku mutu too ne ku dikasa. Ngakenza bidimu bia bungi mu bulalu bua disama.
Mvua mukolele mu tshimenga tshia Alicante, ku luseke lua Est wa Espagne. Mu dîku die
... 
tshibukile panshi, mvua anu ne dijinga dikole dia kuya kumpala. Ngakangata makuta avua mbulamatadi mutuambuluishe nawu, meme kusumba ordinatere ne kumuashisha ku luseke lua bulalu buanyi. Ngakasumba kabidi telefone. Mpindieu, mu dinda dionso muntu udi undama udi untemeshela ordinatere ne telefone. Bua kutua minu mu ordinatere, ndi ntua tshibanga tshianyi pa mbote ya manete a ku bianza atubu baludika nawu manaya a mu ordinatere. Ndi kabidi ne kamulonda kandi nkuata ne mishiku yanyi. Kamulonda aka
...
bua meme kuitaba tshivua tshimfikile atshi to. Ndi mumanye ne: bu mumvua nsonga, mvua muenze bualu bubi budi bulue kunkebela ntatu mikole. Kadi ndi ne disanka dia bungi bua mudi Yehowa kayi mundekele. Mmumpeshe bintu bia bungi: dîku dinene dia mu nyuma, dijinga dia kuikala ne muoyo, disanka dia kuambuluisha bakuabu ne ditekemena dimpe bua matuku atshilualua. Meme muambe ne: nsangisha malu onso aa mu tshiambilu tshimue, ndi mua kuamba ne: Yehowa mmumpeshe bintu bia bungi kupita bimvua mutekemene.

1, 2. Fundo ditshi tuajiya guheta ubambi Mangin’owu?
TANGIZA gale gila udi muwenda lusugu lua gikudi. Dilu diabuita, mvula yasendesa gukuma nu guhenya. Gungima, mvula yavula yasendesa gunoga. Umukamba fundo dia gudisuega. Wasuanguluga ha gumona fundo dimoshi diabonga wajiya gudisuega!
2 Mangino nji tumumona ndaga jia luholo lumoshi. Ndaga jia ha mavu wawa jidi mubola muavula. Wajiya gudihula egi: ‘Fundo ditshi ngajiya guheta ubambi?’ Mu Biblia, musonegi wa mukanda wa ngimbo wazuelele egi: “Muene
... 
ene Yehowa nu Yesu; udi naye nji gutangiza ndaga wana gulonguga nu luholo wajiya gujikalegela mu lujingu luaye. (Yone 17:3) Tangua udi mutanga nu gulonguga Biblia dihule egi: ‘Ndaga jiene jiangulongesa itshi mukunda nu Yehowa Nzambi? Mukunda natshi ngudi naye gumuzumba nu mutshima wami nu monyo wami wagasue?’
14. Luholo lutshi gisambu giajiya gutukuatesa ha gukolesa guzumba guetu gua Yehowa?
14 Gila udi nu futa diaye wamutshima, guta n’enji maga tangua diagasue guajiya gukolesa ufuta wenu. Luhol
...
uholo ana gutshigina ba?’ Gila wamona egi udi naye gubalumuna khadilo diaye, itshite muphushi idi ndaga yabonga diago. Gila tuashila Yehowa mutshima, luko gila tudi gukalagala ngolo ha gumutumagela, Yehowa mbawukhala fundo dietu dia gulengela. Yehowa mbawubamba akombeledi enji agutshigina mu masugu agisugishilo a ulondegi wabola wa Satana. Yehowa watuhana felela dia monyo wa ivo nu ivo mu phaladiso, luholo ayilayele. Yadiago, wajiya guheta lujingu lua tagana gila wazula desizio diabonga mangino!

1. Ndisambila kayi diende lumu dituakonkonona mpindieu?
BANTU miliyo ya bungi mbamanye disambila diende lumu ditubu babikila ne: disambila dia Tatu wetu, anyi Disambila dia Mukalenge. Yezu wakenza disambila edi bua kulongesha bayidi bende mua kusambila. Mmalu kayi avuaye mulombe mu disambila edi? Bua tshinyi disambila edi didi ne mushinga kutudi lelu?
2. Mmalu kayi asatu a mushinga avua Yezu mutulongeshe bua kulomba mu disambila?
2 Yezu wakamba ne: “Nudi ne bua kusambila mushindu eu: ‘Tatu wetu 
... 
a mu diulu bamuimansha pa buloba. Anu mutuamona, malu aa akadi menzeke.
13. Ntshinyi tshivua tshienzeke mu diulu pavuabu bipatamu Satana?
13 Bible udi uleja disanka divua nadi banjelu ba lulamatu pakipatabu Satana ne bademon bende mu diulu. Tudi tubala ne: “Sankayi nuenu diulu ne nuenu badi basombamu!” (Buakabuluibua 12:12) Mpindieu mu diulu muonso mudi ditalala ne buobumue bualu bonso badimu badi benza disua dia Nzambi.
14. Ntshinyi tshidi tshienzeka pa buloba bua mudibu bipate Satana mu diulu?
...
. Malu adi enzeka pa buloba katshia ku 1914 mmajadike ne: bavua bambilamu. Yezu wakatuadija kukokesha bu Mukalenge tshidimu atshi. (Misambu 110:2) Panyima pa bualu ebu, bakimansha Satana pa buloba, ne mpindieu “udi ne tshikondo tshîpi.” (Buakabuluibua 12:12) Mu nshapita udi ulonda, netumone bijadiki bia bungi bidi bileja ne: tudi mu tshikondo atshi. Netumanye kabidi ne: mu katupa kîpi emu Bukalenge bua Nzambi nebuenze bua disua dia Nzambi dienzeke pa buloba.—Tangila Dimanyisha dia ku ndekelu 22.

« Muntu kakuikala ne muoyo anu bua bidia nkayabi, kadi bua mei onso adi alupuka munda mua Nzambi » (Lumu luimpe luakafundabu kudi Luka 4. 4).
Edi ndiandamuna dia Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto kudi Satana muteyanganyi, didi divuluija bena kuitabusha ne, kudisha kua muoyo wa buana bua Nzambi udi munda muabu, ne kudiunda kuabu kua mu nyuma, kudi kufuma ku dibala dilondangane ne dia ku dituku ku dituku dia Dî dia Nzambi.
Bua kukankamika ne kulombola dibala edi, dipungila dipiadipia, tshitupa tshibidi 
... 
 (mv. 14). Lulamatu lujalame ludi lujadika bukokeshi buandi ku tshisumbu tshia mikoko ne ku muoyo wa muntu ne muntu wa kutudi.
Ne lukuna lonso, bena Yuda badi bakonka kabidi Mukelenge : « Biwikala udi Kilisto, utuambile bulelela » (mv. 24). Kutangila, kabiena anu ne wakamana kubambila patupu, (tshilejelu tang. shap. 8. 58), kadi kabidi wakamana kubaleja (mv. 25, 32, 37, 38). Kubangila apu, mudimu wende newikale mulaminyina anu tshisumbu tshiende tshia mikoko. Mikoko ei idi yandi, udi ne bukokesh
...
angidilu, mudi muaku wa dikepesha wa dinanga : bana banyi bakese ba mikoko).
Lumu luimpe ludi lujika. Kadi bionso, biakenza, biakamba, anyi kujadika Muntu mupuangane wakabikumbaja, bidi ne mushinga mutambe bunene, ne Nzambi kena upanga bua kubivuluka nansha (mv. 25). Mikanda minene idi kayiyi mua kujikijibua kubala, ituabala tshikondo tshia tshiendelele. Bua tshikondo etshi, mupikudibue yonso alame ne lukunukunu ne bu dibikila dia muntu nkayende, mei aa a ndekelu a Musungidi : « wewe, undonde ».

‘Midimu yebe mminene ne ya dikema, Yehowa Nzambi, Mukalenge wa tshiendelele.’
1, 2. Bukalenge bua Nzambi nebuenze tshinyi? Bua tshinyi tudi ne bua kuikala bajadike ne: Bukalenge bua Nzambi nebulue?
PAVUA Yezu Kristo ne bayidi bende ku mukuna pabuipi ne tshimenga tshia Kapênuma mu 31, wakabalongesha bua kusambila ne: “Bukalenge buebe bulue.” (Mat. 6:10) Lelu, bantu ba bungi badi bamba ne: Bukalenge ebu kabuakulua to. Kadi, tudi batuishibue ne: Nzambi neandamune masambila atudi tuenza ne muoyo muj
... 
kayi udi tulasa etu tukuambuluishe wewe?
9 Kutuadijila mu 1922, bamanyishi ba Bukalenge bapite pa 17000 bavua bayisha mu matunga mapite pa 58 pa buloba bujima. Kadi, bivua bikengela kubalongesha mudimu. Mu bidimu lukama bia kumpala, Mukalenge musungula wakapesha bayidi bende mêyi matoke a kulonda bua bidi bitangila tshivuabu ne bua kuyisha, muaba wa kuyisha ne mushindu wa kuyisha. (Mat. 10:5-7; Luka 9:1-6; 10:1-11) Mu mushindu wa muomumue lelu, Yezu udi wenza bua bonso badi bayisha Bukalenge bap
...
i alenga ku muoyo a mu bidimu 100 bia bukokeshi bua Bukalenge adi atujadikila ne: Yehowa udi ulombola, ne malu adiye mulongolole bua buloba neakumbane. Tutungunukayi ne kuikala bantu bende badi bamulamate ne kumanyisha Mukalenge ne Bukalenge buende. Tudi tuenza nunku bashindike ne muoyo mujima ne: Yehowa ukadi pa kuandamuna disambila ditudi tuenza ne muoyo mujima dia ne: “Bukalenge buebe bulue.”

KUMPALA kua Yezu kupingana mu diulu, wakambila bayidi bende ne: “Nenuikale bantemu banyi . . . too ne ku ntengu ya buloba.” (Bienzedi 1:8) Mmunyi muvuabu mua kufika ku diyisha pa buloba bujima?
Mulongeshi Martin Goodman wa mu iniversite wa Oxford udi wamba ne: “Mudimu uvuabu bapeshe bena Kristo uvua ubatapulula ne bena mu bitendelelu bikuabu too ne bena Yuda, ku ntuadijilu kua bukokeshi bua bena Lomo.” Yezu uvua uya kuyisha ku muaba ne ku muaba. Bena Kristo balelela bavua ne bua kuidikija tshile
... 
piamupia. Nansha tuetu katuyi ne mushindu wa kuyisha muaba udibu dijinga dinene ne bamanyishi, tudiku mua kukeba mishindu mipiamipia ya kuyisha bantu anyi? Tshilejilu mu 1940, bakanji kulomba bana betu bua kuyisha mu njila dituku dimue ku lumingu. Ukadiku mutete bua kuyisha mu njila anyi? Ukadiku muyishe ne tumatempu tua kutekela mikanda anyi? Bualu budi ne mushinga budi ne: utuku witaba bua kuteta mishindu mipiamipia ya kuyisha lumu luimpe anyi?
Wewe muikale ne mmuenenu muimpe, newikale ne tshi
...
hivuabu basomba pamue atshi.
Bena Kristo balelela kabatu belakana bua kuambila bantu bakuabu malu a mu Bible adibu bitabuja to. Tudi ne bua kuidikija Yezu ne kuambila muntu yonso malu mimpe adi Nzambi mulaye. Nansha tuetu ne mushindu wa kuya anyi katuyi nawu, tuetu bonso tudi mua kuenza muetu muonso bua kuambuluisha bakuabu mu bisumbu bietu. (Galatiya 6:10) Patudi tuambuluisha bakuabu netuikale ne disanka ne netutungunuke ne ‘kukuama mamuma mu mudimu wonso muimpe.’—Kolosayi 1:10; Bienzedi 20:35.

Shebena uvua mulami wa bintu ‘ku mutu kua nzubu,’ pamuapa wa mukalenge Hezikiya. Uvua ne muanzu mulondele wa mukalenge nkayende, ne bavua bamutekemene mu malu a bungi.
22:15, 16
Shebena uvua ne bua kuikala muditatshishe bua majinga a bantu ba Yehowa
Wakimanyina pa majinga ende bua kudikebela butumbi buende nkayende
22:20-22
Yehowa wakateka Eleyakima pa muaba wa Shebena
Bakapesha Eleyakima ‘nsapi wa ku nzubu wa Davidi,’ uvua uleja bukole ne bukokeshi
Buebe wewe: Mmunyi muvua Shebena mua kuikala muenze mudimu ne bukokeshi buende bua kuambuluisha bakuabu?

Pamuapa kakuena tshintu tshidi tshitamba kutuvuija bashilangane ne bantu bakuabu bu mudimu wetu wa kuyisha ku nzubu ne ku nzubu, mu njila ne miaba idi bantu ba bungi bakunguila to. Bua tshinyi tutu tuenza mudimu eu?
Bantemu ba Yehowa badi bayisha bua kutumbisha Nzambi ne kumanyisha dîna diende (Ebelu 13:15) Tudi kabidi basue kutumikila Yezu Kristo wakatuelela mukenji eu: “Nunku, ndayi nuvuije bantu ba mu bisamba bionso bayidi. Nubalongeshe mua kutumikila malu onso amvua munuambile.”—Matayi 28:19
... 
i batu ne malu atubu bitabuja mu bitendelelu biabu ne ki mmuntu yonso utu witaba mukenji wetu to. Tutu bamanye kabidi ne: malongesha a mu Bible adi asungila bantu. Ke bualu kayi tudi ‘tutungunuka ne kulongesha ne kuamba lumu luimpe lua Kristo’ anu bu bena Kristo ba mu bidimu lukama bia kumpala.—Bienzedi 5:41, 42.
Antonio Cova Maduro mumanyi wa malu a mu nsombelu wakafunda bua “madikolela adi Bantemu ba Yehowa benza ne ntatu idibu batuilangana nayi, badipangisha too ne amue malu bua dîyi dia Nzam
...
abala mikanda yetu ki mbatemu ba Yehowa to. Bantu ba bungi batudi tulonga nabu Bible badi mu bitendelelu bikuabu. Kadi batu ne dianyisha dia bungi patu bantemu ba Yehowa baya kubatangila ku mbanza yabu.
Bushuwa, udi mua kuikala ne nkonko mikuabu idi itangila Bantemu ba Yehowa. Tudi tukulomba bua kumanya mandamuna adibu bafila wewe:
Muebeje umue wa ku Bantemu ba Yehowa.
Mubuele mu site wetu wa ku Enternete wa www.jw.org.
Mubuele mu bisangilu bietu bitu bantu bonso babuela kabayi bafuta makuta to.

Yoshua ne Solomo bakajadika bonso ne: dîyi nansha dimue dia mu milayi ya Yehowa kadiakapanga kukumbana. (Yos 23:14; 1Bk 8:56) Bujadiki bua bantemu babidi ba kueyemena aba budi butupesha kabidi tshishimikidi tshikole tshia kuibakila ditabuja dietu.—2Ko 13:1; Tit 1:2.
Yehowa uvua mukumbaje milayi yende mu tshikondo tshia Yoshua mushindu kayi? Monayi wewe ne dîku diebe drama wa ‘Kakuena dîyi nansha dimue didi dipange kukumbana.’ Pashishe nuandamune nkonko eyi: 1) Mmunyi mundi mua kuidikija bienzedi bia ditabuja bia Lahaba? (Eb 11:31; Yak 2:24-26) 2) Mmunyi mudi tshilejilu tshia Akana tshileja ne: dibenga kutumikila ku bukole ditu difikisha ku kabutu? 3) Nansha muvua bena Gibeona bikale bena mvita, bua tshinyi bavua bashime Yoshua ne bakebe ditalala ne bena Isalele? 4) Mmunyi muvua dîyi dia Yehowa dikumbane pavua bakalenge 5 ba bena Amona bafunyina bena Isalele? (Yos 10:5-14) 5) Mmunyi mudi Yehowa mukuambuluishe paudi muteke Bukalenge bua Nzambi ne buakane buende pa muaba wa kumpala mu nsombelu webe?—Mat 6:33.
Patudi tuela meji bikole bua bionso bidi Yehowa muenze, bidiye wenza, ne bienzaye, ditabuja dietu mu milayi yende nedikole.—Lom 8:31, 32.

Iran, udi ditunga dia mu Asie wa ku Ouest. Udi ne mikalu ne ditunga dia Turquie ku nord-ouest ne dia Irak ku ouest, Azerbaijan, Arménie, Mbuu wa Kaspi ne Turkménistan ku nord, Afghanistan ku est, Pakistan ku sud-est, ne Tshibuelelu tshia Oman ne tshia Perse ku sud. Bu mudi ditunga dia Iran didi ne bantu ba bisamba bipite pa 90 mu tshitupa tshia kilometre kare mipite pa 1.648.195 (636.372 sq mi), Iran udi pa muaba wa 17 pa buloba bujima mu bunene ne mu bungi bua bantu. 8] Ndi ditunga dia muanda mutekete didi ne mikuna ya bungi pa buloba bujima. Mu bulelela, ditunga dia ditunga dia Islam, Iran didi ne bena mu tshitendelelu tshia ba-Musulman ba bungi. Mu ditunga edi mudi provense 31. Tehran ntshimenga tshikulu tshia ditunga edi, ntshimenga tshinene tshia ditunga edi ne ntshimenga tshia malu a makuta.

Tshibejibeji etshi tshivua ne tshizubu tshipiatshipia tshivua ne tshimfuanyi tshia muendu uvua pa mâyi manene avua ne mavuala makole ne uvua utokesha muulu muvua mufiike. Munda mua tshibejibeji

ngadika bua tshisumbu kayi ukonka bakulu bakuabu to. Kadi, mu 1972, Kasumbu kaludiki kakashintulula bualu kampanda bunene. Mbualu kayi abu?

ila malu adi menzeke mu makumi a bidimu mashale aa, tudi ne dianyisha bua kumona ne: malu adi Yehowa muakaje ku kakese ku kakese ku diambuluisha dia Mukalenge wetu bua bidi bitangila mudimu wa ditangila mmakoleshe buobumue buetu bua ntendelelu. (Mus. 99:4) Nunku, lelu bantu ba Yehowa ba pa buloba bujima badi basanka bua mutudi tuenda “mu lungenyi lua muomumue,” tulonda “mu makasa amue amue” ne tuenzela “Nzambi wa ditalala” mudimu ‘diapa dionso muinshi mua bujitu.’—2 Kol. 12:18; bala Sefanya 3:9.

Balombodi banayi ba bimvundu badi bafundila Ngovena wa tshimenga tshia Kinshasa Ngobila Mbaka mu mukanda wa mu dinda dia 29 ngondo 5 wa 2023, udi ne kopi uvua mufike kudi Editorial 7. Net, bua kuenza tshisangilu tshia bantu tshikalabu ne bua kuenza mu dia 17 ngondo 6 wa 2023 mu muaba wa Sainte Thérèse mu commune wa N’djili.
” Mukelenge mbulamatadi, tudi tukumanyisha ne: balombodi banayi badi batua tshiala pa mukanda wa Lubumbashi: bayende Delly Sesanga, Augustin Matata Ponyo, Martin Fayulu ne Moïse Katumbi Tshapwe, badi balombodi ba bisumbu bia tshididi, tshisumbu tshia RD. Congo (Envol), Leadership and Governance pour le Développement (LGD), Engagement pour la Citoyenneté et le Développement (ECIDé) ne Ensemble pour la République (Ensemble), nebikale benza tshisangilu tshia bantu mu muaba wa Sainte Thérèse mu dia 17 ngondo muisambombo wa tshidimu tshia 2023 mu dîba dia 10:00, bua kuyukila ne bantu ba mu Kinshasa bua malu a mushinga a ditunga ′′, ke mudibu baleja mu mukanda eu mufunda ku bianza bia ba sekretere minene ba bisumbu binayi bia tshididi bidibu batele ebi.
Pashishe, balombodi banayi aba badi balomba Gentiny Ngobila bua kuenza malu adi akengedibua bua kulombola ne kulama bantu badibu babikile bua kujadika bualu bunene ebu.
“Bua kulombola ne kulama bena Kinshasa ne bena Kinshasa badi balua ba bungi bua kuteleja balombodi babu, tudi tunulomba bua kuenza malu onso adi atangila bualu ebu bilondeshile mikenji, mukanda eu udi ujika”.
Shekinah Gloire kabongo

Bupole budi mushindu wa kusomba mu ditalala ne dibenga kwikala mu ndululu, mu bilumbu ne mu mvita. Bupole budi kiipatshila ka beena tshidiidi, ne ka bantu bonso, ka matunga ne bisumbu bishilangana bia bantu. Mu nsombelu wa bantu, bupole budi bwikale diunvuangana ne malanda adi mikala pankatshi pa bantu ne mankenene a ambula kalonda. Bupole kabwena anu dibenga kwikala dia bilumbu ne mvita, kadi dipangadika dishindame dia kwikala mu ditalala ne lutuulu ne kusomba ne lubatshi diiba dia malu makole ne makenga. Nangananga lumvu, lusombi ne miyuki pankatshi pa bidimba bia nsangilu wa bantu. Bupole nse dishintulangana dia bintu. Budi kabidi bumvwija bukole bwa kusomba mu bwobumwe ne mwaneenu anyi ne ditunga. Bupole ke budi bufikisha ku dibuluka.
Appearance

- Kinshasa: Baleji mpala ba bibambalu bishila shilangana bidi mu Société civile bavua bipeta ngumu ya mudimu udi monusco wenza bua dikuba ku Esta wa ditunga ne mu diluisha disama dia ebola .
- Lubumbashi:ba mambala ba dynamique de la nouvelle société civile bavua bapueka mu njila makelela mushala wa disatu badiombola dipanda dia dipanga dikubibua mu tshimenga tshia lubumbashi .
- Kananga : ku Kananga, kabadi ka basalayi nkakuata mfumu wa baluma ba mvita . Mubiayi Dewayo ki dina dienda udi mu kuata mu cachot ka Auditorat Supérieur wa kabadi ka baslayi wa kasai occidental wa kale .
- Kinshasa:mu ngumu eyi ne tuakula bua muibidi udi mumuenaka bikola matuku aa mu quartiers yonsu yidi mu tshimenga tshia Kinshasa.
- Kisangani: ba ngenda mushinga ba mu Province wa Maniema badi bela kabobu kudi balombodi ba ditunga ne ba polovense bua se ba bambuluisha bua kumbusha bintu biabu bidi bikalama mu depot mu Commune wa Lubunga .
- Kinshasa: Bena Direction générale des douanes et accises mu tshikosu DGDA badi bangata bantu ku mudimu.

Tudi ku ndekelu kua tshidimu tshia 32 B.B., bidimu bitue ku bisatu katshia Yezu wabatijibua. Yeye ne bayidi bende bavua bafuma ku dienza Tshibilu tshia Nzubu ya ntenta mu Yelushalema. Badi pamuapa mua kuikala batshidi pabuipi apu. (Luka 10:38; Yone 11:1) Mu bulelela, Yezu uvua mupitshishe ngondo ya bungi ya ku isambombo ya mudimu ivua mimushadile mu Yudaya anyi dia muamua dia Musulu wa Yadene mu distrike dia Peleya. Bivua bikengela kuyisha kabidi mu miaba eyi.
Matuku makese bobu bamane kuenza Pa

Leza wisambanga netu kupityila ku Bible. 2 Temote 3:16
Leza wa bine wāludikile bantu basoneke milangwe yandi mu dibuku dimo dijila. Dino dibuku i Bible. Mudi myanda ya kamweno ikusakila Leza uyuke.
Leza uyukile byonso bitufwaninwe, kadi ye Nsulo ya tunangu tonso. Shi umuteje, usa kwikala wa ñeni bya binebine.
Leza usakanga muntu yense pano pa ntanda atange Bible. Pano Bible udi mu ndimi mivule.
Shi usaka kuteja Leza, ufwaninwe kutanga Bible ne kumwivwanija.
Konsokonso bantu batejanga. Mateo 28:19
Batumoni ba Yehova bakakukwasha wivwanije Bible.
Bafundijanga bubinebine butala padi Leza pano pa ntanda ponso.
Kukafutapo kantu nansha kamo pangala pa buno bufundiji. Kadi ukokeja kwifunda myanda itala padi Leza ku Njibo ya Bulopwe ya Batumoni ba Yehova mu kyenu kibundi.

MULELA MU 1960
DITUNGA DIABU: FRANCE
TSHIVUAYE: MUNU WA BINTU BIA LULENGU MUENA TSHIKISU, KAYI UNEMEKA BANTU BAKAJI
TSHIMVUA KALE:
Ndi muledibue mu Mulhouse, ku nord est kua France, muaba wa ku mpenga kua tshimenga uvua mumanyike bua malu a tshikisu, benamu batu benza midimu ya bianza. Malu andi mvuluka a ku buana buanyi adi anu a ditandangana dikole dia bena mu mêku ba muaba au. Mu dîku dietu, bantu bakaji kabavua ne mushinga to, koku bualu bivua bikole bua kuebeja mmuenenu wabu. Bavua bandonge
... 
abidi mmufuisha bundu kumpala kua bena mutumba.
Dikuabu dituku butuku, mvua mukuatshike bikole, ngakatua nzubu wetu kapia. Mukajanyi wakansungila, kusungila kabidi muanetu wa bidimu 5 ku kapia. Pakantenduka maluvu, biakantonda bikole. Munda muanyi, ngakumvua ne: Nzambi kavua mua kumfuila luse to. Ndi mvuluka musangu kampanda uvua Abé ulongesha ne: bantu babi badi baya mu iferno. Too ne munganga wanyi wakangambila ne: “Biebe biakupita! Kakuena tshintu tshidi mua kukupikula to.”
MUSHINDU UVUA BIBL
...
 ne disanka dia kungambuluisha bu mundi mukulu mu tshisumbu.
Dinanga dia Yehowa Nzambi ne luse luende mbilenge muoyo wanyi bikole menemene. Ndi ne dijinga dikole dia kuakula bua ngikadilu yende kudi bantu badi kabayi ne ditekemena, bualu bantu ba bungi bavua bammona nanku. Ndi mumanye ne: Bible udi ne bukole bua kuambuluisha muntu yonso bua kupeta nsombelu muimpe ne wa disanka. Bible ki mmundongeshe anu mua kunanga ne kunemeka balume ne bakaji nkayaku to, kadi mmundongeshe kabidi mua kudinemeka.

UDI ubuela mu Nzubu wenu wa Bukalenge, ne kuena umanya kabidi muaba au to. Utu misangu yonso udiumvua bua nzubu eu. Udi mua kuikala utshidi uvuluka amue malu mimpe a tshikondo tshiuvua muambuluishe bua kumuibaka kukadi kupita ndambu wa bidimu. Kadi mu mushindu kampanda, udi udiumvua mpindieu bikole, bualu mbavuije Nzubu wa Bukalenge eu muaba wa diambuluishila bantu bua tshitupa tshîpi. Panyima pa tshipepele tshikole tshia mvula tshivua tshipasalaje mâyi ne tshinyangakaje bintu muaba uudi musombele mu matuku mashale emu, Komite wa filiale wakalongolola malu lukasa lukasa bua bantu bavua tshipupu tshikuate bapete biakudia, bilamba, mâyi mimpe, ne diambuluisha dikuabu. Mapa adibu bafila bua kuambuluishangana nawu mmateka bimpe mu bulongame. Bana betu ba balume ne ba bakaji badi babuela, bangata bidibu nabi dijinga, ne misangu ya bungi, bakupula binsonji bia disanka ku mêsu abu.
Yezu wakamba ne: tshimanyinu tshinene tshia bantu bende tshivua ne bua kuikala tshia kunangangana. (Yone 13:34, 35) Mu tshitupa etshi netukonkonone mudi dinanga dia bena Kristo dimuenekela mu midimu ya luibaku ne midimu ya diambuluishangana idi Bantemu ba Yehowa benza. Dinanga dia nunku didi tshijadiki tshia bukole tshidi tshileja ne: tudi ku bukokeshi bua Bukalenge bua Yezu.

1. Tshitendelelu tshilelela tshitu anu tshimue anyi?
Yezu wakalongesha bayidi bende anu bua tshitendelelu tshimue tshilelela. Ntshienze anu bu njila udi ufikisha ku muoyo wa tshiendelele. Yezu wakamba bua njila au ne: “Bantu bakese ke badi bamupeta.” (Matayi 7:14) Nzambi udi witaba anu tshitendelelu tshidi tshiangatshila malongesha mu Dîyi diende. Batendeledi balelela bonso badi mu buobumue, badi ne ditabuja dimue.

...
atu bangata dîba diabu ne bintu bidibu nabi bua kuambuluisha bakuabu. —Bala Yone 13: 34, 35; 1 Yone 4:20.

YEZU UDI WENDA PA MÂYI, UBATAMIJA TSHIPEPELE
Bukole bua Yezu buvuaye mukuate nabu mudimu bua kudiisha bantu ba bungi mu tshishima buvua bulenge bantu ba bungi. Bakamba ne: “Eu udi bulelela Muprofete uvua ne bua kulua pa buloba,” Masiya, ne uvua bushuwa ne bua kuikala mukalenge muimpe. (Yone 6:14; Dutelonome 18:18) Nunku bantu bakalongolola bua kukuata Yezu ne kumuteka mukalenge.
Kadi Yezu wakajingulula tshivua ban
... 
, bakela mbila bua buôwa bamba ne: “Ntshilengulengu!”—Mâko 6:49.
Yezu wakabakankamija wamba ne: “Koleshayi muoyo! Mmeme; kanutshinyi to.” Kadi Petelo wakamba ne: “Mukalenge, pikalabi ne: nguewe, tuma dîyi ndue kuudi pa mâyi.” Yezu wakandamuna ne: “Luaku!” Ke Petelo kupatuka mu buatu, ne bushuwa wakendela pa mâyi ne kuyaye mutangile kudi Yezu. Kadi pakatangilaye tshipepele tshikole, wakumvua buôwa, kutuadijaye kudina. Wakela dîyi ne: “Mukalenge, nsungila!” Yezu wakolola tshianza kukuataye Petelo 
...
mutuadila babedi. Pavua babedi aba balenga anu luzembe lua tshilamba tshia pa mutu tshia Yezu, masama abu avua ajika.
Tshikondo atshi, musumba wa bantu bavua bamone Yezu udiisha bantu binunu bia bungi mu tshishima bakamanya ne: Yezu uvua mumbuke. Nunku pavua tumatu tukese tua mu Tibelia tufike, bantu bakabuelamu ne kuya ku Kapênuma bua kupeta Yezu. Pakamupetabu, bakamuebeja ne: “Labi, uvua mufike muaba eu dîba kayi?” (Yone 6:25) Yezu wakabatandisha muikale ne kabingila, anu mutuabimona pashishe.

8 Ke Hezikiya kuambila Yeshaya ne: “Dîyi dia Yehowa diudi muambe ndimpe.” Pashishe yeye kuamba kabidi ne: “Bualu nekuikale ditalala ne dishindama tshikondo tshintshidi ne muoyo.”+

Ntshinyi tshiafikila bantu matuku atshilualua?
Kakuyi mpata, bantu nebatungunuke anu ne kulubuluka mu malu a sianse. Kadi, dinga dituku nebafikaku ku dienza nsangilu kampanda wa bantu badi batabalelangana bonso ne muoyo mujima anyi? Kabiena nanku to. Lelu eu, budinangi ne lukuka mbikokeshe bantu ba buloba bujima. Kadi Nzambi mmulongoluele dîku dia bukua bantu tshintu kampanda tshimpe tshitambe.—Bala 2 Petelo 3:13.
Dîyi dia Nzambi didi diakula bua nsangilu wa bantu ba buloba bujima mu matuku atshilualua bikala bonso banangangane. Nebasombe talalaa, kakuyi udi mua kubenzela bibi to.—Bala Mika 4:3, 4.
Budinangi nebujike mushindu kayi?
Pakafukabu muntu kudi Nzambi ku ntuadijilu, muntu kavua ne muoyo wa budinangi to. Kadi pakasungula muntu wa kumpala bua kubenga kutumikila Nzambi, wakalua muena mapanga. Kudiye nkutuakapiana muoyo wa budinangi eu. Tshidibi, Nzambi neapingajile bantu bupuangane ku diambuluisha dia Yezu.—Bala Lomo 7:21, 24, 25.
Anu muvua disua dia Nzambi, Yezu wakafua lufu lua mulambu, yeye kujimija lutatu luvua dibenga kutumikila dia muntu wa kumpala dikebeshe. (Lomo 5:19) Mushindu au ke uvua Yezu mupeteshe malu mimpe a dikema atshilualua mpunga wa kuenzekawu, pikala bantu kabatshiyi kabidi ne muoyo wa budinangi wa kuenza bualu bubi to.—Bala Musambu wa 37:9-11.

Ngakatambula mu 1941 pamvua ne bidimu 12. Kadi anu mu 1946 ke mungakumvua bimpe bulelela bua mu Bible. Bua tshinyi bivua nanku? Indilayi nnulondele.
BU MU tshidimu tshia 1910, baledi banyi bakumbuka mu Tbilissi, mu Géorgie kuyabu mu Canada. Bavua basombele mu kamutanda kakese kavua pabuipi ne Pelly mu Saskatchewan, ku ouest kua Canada. Bakandela mu 1928, ne mvua wa mukala mu bana basambombo. Papa wakafua ngondo isambombo kumpala kua kundelabu, ne maman wakafua pantshivua muana wa mu maboko. Matu
... 
vua muyishe mu njila. Wakitaba bua kuikala wangata bibejibeji ne wakajinga bua meme kumonangana ne bayende Gary. Ngakaya kuende, tuetu kuyukila mutantshi mule, kufunda malu bungi tshianana. Kumbukila anu ku dituku adi katuakamonangana kabidi to, kadi bidimu ndambu pashishe, ngakapapuka dimue dituku pangakabamona balua kungela muoyo mu mpungilu wa mu Toronto, mu Ontario. Dituku adi ke divua Gary utambula. Bualu ebu buakamvuluija mushinga wa kutungunuka ne kuyisha, bualu katuena bamanye, dimue dit
...
oyo wa tshiendelele.” (Yone 6:66-68) Anu bu bena Kristo nanyi bakuabu ba bungi bavua bampudi matshi bakavua ne matuku a bungi mu bulelela, ngakalonga bua kuikala ne lutulu. Ngakalonga mua kueyemena Yehowa ne bulongolodi buende, ne ngakapeta masanka a bungi. Lelu kudi mikanda ya bungi mu muakulu wanyi, ne ndi ne disanka bua mundi mbuela mu bisangilu ne mu mpungilu mu muakulu wa tumama wa bena Amerike. Bushuwa, ndi mmupete nsombelu muimpe ne wa disanka mu dienzela Yehowa Nzambi wetu munene mudimu.

Itshi wana gukalagala gila wavua woma?— Tangua diko wana gukamba ukuateshi wa sh’aye nga gin’aye. Uvi gudi nu muthu muko wajiya gugukuatesa. Udi nu ngolo jiavula gubalega athu agasue. Wajiya muthu muene ba?— Ayi, Yehowa Nzambi. Tute lumene lua muvuala wayala mumoshi mu Biblia, jina dienji Davidi. Wajiyile egi Yehowa mba umukuatesa tangua diagasue, avileko woma.
Sadika tangua Davidi akhadile bebe, mvuaji jienji jiamulongesele guzumba Yehowa. Yakuatesele Davidi hagubemba woma tangua dia milonga ya
... 
e.
Davidi wakalegele mulonga uko udi mumonesa egi akhadileko guvua woma ndo. Ana Isalele akhadile mulua ita nu enya filistiya. Suta mumoshi wa filistiya wakhadile muthu wakoma, waleha nu ngolo jiavula! Jina dienji Goliyate. Suta muene wakhadile gushingana Yehowa nu ana Isalele. Goliyate wazuelele nu lusegu luagasue egi suta wa gu Isalele udi nu ngolo aze tulue n’enji. Uvi ana Isalele agasue amuvidile woma wavula. Tangua Davidi avile ndaga yene, walezele Goliyate egi: ‘Ngudi guguluisa! Yehowa udi
...
hala; seso diene diamunginyine gu mbombo! Goliyate wabuile hashi, wafua! Enya filistiya avile woma wavula, alengele khungi’agasue. Nanyi wa kuatesele muvuala Davidi ashiya Goliyate?— Yehowa wamukuatesele, Yehowa wakhala nu ngolo jiavula gubalega Goliyate!
Lumene lua Davidi luajiya gutulongesa gima gitshi?— Yehowa udi nu ngolo jiabaleka muthu wagasue ; udi futa diaye. Gila wavua luko woma, jiya egi, Yehowa wajiya gugukuatesa haguheta jingolo!

WE MULOMBENE kubadika Bible abadi bafunde mu kina Ebelu su? We kwalula’shi nya. Pangi tobandile su nkumona Bible abadi bafunde mu kina Ebelu. Anka we kutamisha lutumbu loobe bwa Bible odi naye pa kupusha myanda ibakitshine ungi muntu mulongye ngofu abetanyinaa bu Elias Hutter na ma Bible abidi abatushishe mu ludimi lwa kina Ebelu. Uno muntu badi kwanka mu siekele a 16.
Elias Hutter badi mutandjikwe mu kipwa kya 1553 mu Görlitz, ka musoko kapela ke pepi na mupaka wa eumbo dya Allemagne, Pologne n
... 
nde nouveau (avec notes et références), mbafube na uno nfundilo umune mu mayi e kushi kw’esaki. * Kishima kinabene mbekifunde na maleta akata, kadi maleta abadi balungye kumpala sunga kunyima kwa kishima, mbeafunde mu maleta apeela. Kino kifwatulo ki mu dino esaki akilesha nfundilo badi mu Bible a mu kina Ebelu ababafundile kwi Hutter, mu mukanda wa Esekyele 18:4. Bino ngi byabadi bafunde mu Bible a Traduction du monde nouveau mu uno verse umune mu mayi e kuushi kw’esaki.
“KILOMBENO KIPYA” MU KI
...
 7 Tala mayi e kuushi kw’esaki a kabidi mu Ezekiel 18:4 na mu Apandise 3B mu Bible a Traduction du monde nouveau (avec notes et références).
^ par. 9 Abimweneka’shi bangi bantu balongye babadi bapwe kutusha Kilombeno kipya mu kina Ebelu kumpala kwaye. Umune a kwabadi nyi Simon Atoumanos, mukata a kipwilo a mu Byzantine, mu kipwa kya 1360. A kabidi nyi Oswald Schreckenfuchs, muntu mulongye ngofu a mu Allemagne, mu kipwa kya 1565. Ano ma Bible tambeapalakashe kwi bantu bebungi na ngapwe kushimina.

- Bunia:Mu Ituri, bantu 8 bavua bashipa , bakuabu bajimina ne nzubu mitua kapia mu dinayi ne mu ditanu kudi baluma ba mvita ba CODECO mu misoku yidi pabuipi ne Bule mu territoire wa Djugu

- Bandundu:Balongeshi ba tulasa tua mbula matadi tua mu polovense wa Maï-Ndombe, batu bafutshibua ku Caritas développement, badi balomba mafutu abu a ngondu wa 8 tshidimu etshi.

TSHIBUMBA TSHIA NSENTEDI (TSHIA KULONGA) Ngondo wa 9 2016
Mu nimero eu mudi biena-bualu bia kulonga kutuadijila mu dia 24 ngondo wa 10 too ne dia 27 ngondo wa 27 wa 2016.
Udiku udiumvua muenzejibue bua kuitaba malu adi bantu bakuabu bitaba bu mudi dilongesha dia ne: bintu mbidienzekele pamutu pa kuitaba ne: bavua babifuke anyi? Bikalabi nanku, tshiena-bualu etshi tshidi tshikutangila.
Utuku imue misangu udiumvua kuyi mukumbane bua kuambuluisha muanebe anyi? Kudi malu anayi adi mua kukuambuluisha bua kupatula bipeta bimpe.

TSHIBUMBA TSHIA NSENTEDI NGONDO WA 11 2014
Satana mmuntu mulelela anyi?
Bikala Satana kayiku, nunku bantu badi bamutshina mbapambuke. Kadi bikala Satana utu ushimakaja bantu, nanku mmuntu mubi bikole kupita mudi bantu ba bungi bela meji.
Satana mbubi anyi peshi mmuntu udi ne mubidi wa nyuma?
Miyuki ibidi ya mu Bible idi yandamuna lukonko elu bimpe.
Nzambi mmulongolole mishindu inayi idi mua kukukuba ku mateyi a Satana.
Mulayi wa mu Bible ne tshilota tshivua Nzambi mulotesha mukalenge wa bena Babilona bidi bileja tshidimu tshijalame tshidi bualu ebu buenzeke.
Mmunyi muvua Jozefe mutantamene mushindu uvua mukaji wa Potifâ udienzeja bua kumusesuisha?
Ntshinyi tshidi dibisha dia Yezu dia bantu ku lufu ditujadikila bua milayi yende idi itangila matuku atshilualua?

siness Layers, Fuhitsu systems, Geocoton, Madge, Netrix, Bourgier, Vanguard, corporation munene ne bikuabu.
Mu bualu ebu, bavua batambe kuimanyina pa mudimu wa madimi, bualu mu mudimu eu muikala tshia kuenza tshia meji ne tshia kuenza tshidi tshileja malu a tshididi bua provense wa Kasaï central.
Tudi mua kuamba ne: ATLAS GROUP uvua muanji kuimanyina pa buloba bua ku Mputu, kadi wakaya kabidi mu Amerike kumpala kua kutuadija kuimanyina bikole pa buloba bua Afrike budibu bamona bu muendeshi mupia
...
uvua Kabeya mumupeshe.
Tudi ne bua kumanya ne: bisangilu bionso ne dikumbula miaba ya mudimu mu France ne mu Belgique bmu kambuluisha John Kabeya Shikayi, nguvena wa Kasaï central bua kumanya ntatu idi pankatshi pa malongolodi aa bua kuakula bua mushindu wa kukumbaja midimu idi ne bua kusungila provense wa Kasaï central.
Malu onso mimpe adi ajika bimpe, Ngovena John Kabeya wakapingana kumbelu ne disanka bua bipeta bimpe bia mudimu wende mu provense wende wa Kasai Central.

1-3. Mmalu kayi avua menzeke Petelo muikalaku? Mmalu kayi avuaye mutuilangane nawu butuku?
PETELO uvua wenda utata bua kuita buatu, padiye utangila ku Est udi umona tshibuitshibuitshi bu mutshidiku midima. Butuku bukavua buenda butshia anyi? Mongo ne makaya bikavua bimusama bualu uvua muite buatu mêba a bungi. Tshipepele tshivua tshipepula nsuki yende tshivua tshijule mavuala makole pa Mbuu wa Galela. Mavuala avua atatu ku buatu buvuabu baloba nabu eku ne eku, amusampushila ne mâyi matalale pa m
... 
akalenga dinene bua kuambuluisha Kristo bua kumuangalaja mu ditunga mukenji wa ditekemena! Kadi uvua mua kukumbana anyi? Mmunyi muvua Petelo mua kudisha dîku diende? Imue misangu Petelo uvua mua kuikala kabidi muele meji bua muvuaye mupitshishe butuku bujima kayi mukuate nansha kantu.—Luka 5:1-3.
13, 14. Ntshishima kayi tshivua Yezu muenzele Petelo? Ntshinyi tshivua Petelo muenze?
13 Pavua Yezu mujikije kuyisha, wakambila Petelo ne: “Semeja buatu muaba udi mâyi male, nuele tupamba tuenu bua kuku
...
mba ne: “Wewe udi Muana wa Nzambi menemene.” (Mat. 14:33) Pakavua ku mêsu kuenda kutoka pa mâyi, muoyo wa Petelo uvua ne bua kuikala muule tente ne dianyisha. Wakalekela dielakana ne buôwa. Mu bulelela, uvua ne malu a bungi avuaye ne bua kushintulula mu nsombelu wende kumpala kua kuikalaye muena Kristo udi bu dibue anu bu muvua Yezu mudianjile kumona. Kadi uvua mudisuike bua kushintuluka ne kuya kumpala. Udi pebe mudisuike bua kuenza nunku anyi? Neumone ne: Petelo uvua ne ditabuja dia kuidikija.

ansha. Pabi mbulamatadi muikala ufutshisha bitadi ni imue mikanda, bikala bibueja mfualanga mu difueta dia mbulamatadi. Lukonku ludiyi udiebeja ndua se ba wetu aba ni batuma babu bana mu kalasa mushindu kayi? Bualu nkushala lumingu amu lumue bua kubueja bana mu tulasa.

“Meji mu mutshima”
Meji malelela ntshimue tshia ku bintu bia mushinga mukole biudi mua kukeba. Yehowa nkayende ke utu uafila. Mu tshitupa etshi netumone meji adi kaayi ne ndekelu a Yehowa Nzambi uvua muena lulamatu Yobo muambe ne: “Udi ne meji mu mutshima.”—Yobo 9:4.

HENOKA wakalala bidimu bia bungi. Bidi mua kutukolela bua kubielela meji, kadi bidimu bia muoyo wa muntu lelu mbishadile bikole menemene ku bidimu 365 bivua Henoka muenze, mmumue ne: bidimu bia muntu wa lelu bidi bibuelamu misangu mipite pa inayi! Kadi mu bulelela, bua mu tshikondo tshiende atshi kavua muntu mukole to. Kukadi bidimu bipite pa 5000, bantu bavua balala bidimu bia bungi kupita lelu. Adama muntu wa kumpala ukavua ne bidimu bipite pa 600 pavuabu balele Henoka, ne wakashala kabidi ne 
... 
nde bua kulumbuluisha bantu bonso, ne bua kupisha bantu bonso badi kabayi banemeka Nzambi bua bienzedi biabu bibi bivuabu benze mu mushindu udi kawuyi unemeka Nzambi, ne bua malu a bundu onso avua benji ba malu mabi badi kabayi banemeka Nzambi bamuambe.” (Yuda 14, 15) Tshintu tshia kumpala tshiudi mua kumona mu mêyi aa ntshia ne: Henoka uvua wakula bienze anu bu ne: Nzambi ukavua muenze tshidi mêyi a buprofete aa amba. Ntshilejilu tshivua milayi ya bungi yakalua pashishe milonde. Lungenyi ludimu
...
a uvuabu babikila ne: Mukanda wa Henoka, kadi mukanda au uvua ne malu a mafi adibu kabayi bamanye kudiwu mafumine, udibu bashima ne: ngua Henoka. Udi ne mêyi a buprofete a Henoka anu mudiwu, kadi avua mua kuikala mangatshila mu bintu kampanda bia kale bidi kabiyiku kabidi lelu, avua pamuapa mafunda mu mikanda anyi mamba mukana. Yuda uvua mua kuikala muangatshile mêyi aa mu bintu bia kale ebi, anyi uvua mua kuikala mumanyine malu a Henoka kudi Yezu uvua mumone nsombelu wa Henoka katshia mu diulu.

CHRISTOPHER, nsonga wa mu ditunga dia Ghana udi wamba ne: “Kuikala mu malanda ne Nzambi kudi kuenza bua udiumvue mu bukubi ne mushindame. Bienza anu bu ne: Nzambi udi misangu yonso ukutabalela bua diakalenga diebe.”
HANNAH, muana wa bidimu 13 wa mu Alaska mu États-Unis udi wamba ne: “Nzambi udi umona makenga ebe wonso, ukutabalela ne dinanga dionso kupita muudi mua kuela meji.”
GINA, mamu wa bidimu 40 ne bia mu njila wa mu Jamaïque udi wamba ne: “Kumanya ne: udi mu malanda mimpe ne Nzambi kudi k
... 
ua pabuipi ne Nzambi anyi? Peshi udi musue kusemena pabuipi nende anyi? Pamuapa udi mua kudiebeja ne: ‘Bidiku mua kuenzeka bushuwa bua muntu wetu eu kuikalaye mu malanda mimpe ne Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso anyi? Bikalabi nanku, mushindu kayi?’
KUDI MUSHINDU WA MUNTU KUSEMENA PABUIPI NE NZAMBI
Bilondeshile Bible kudi mushindu wa muntu kuikala mu malanda ne Nzambi. Bible udi wamba ne: Nzambi wakabikila Abalahama nkambua wa bena Ebelu ne: “mulunda wanyi.” (Yeshaya 41:8) Mona kabidi dibikila didi mu Ya
...
pabuipi’ nende ne kudia nende bulunda?
Bua kuandamuna lukonko elu, tukonkonone tshitu tshienzeka bua bantu kutuadijabu kudia bulunda. Pa tshibidilu patu bantu babidi basua kudia bulunda batu banji kuambilangana mêna abu. Pashishe, padibu bayukidilangana pa tshibidilu ne bambilangana malu, bulunda buabu budi bukola. Padibu badienzeja bua kuenzelangana malu mimpe, bulunda buabu budi bukola bikole. Ke mudibi kabidi bua bulunda budi muntu mua kudia ne Nzambi. Tukonkononayi mudibi mua kuenzeka nanku.

WEWE mubale tshikandakanda kayi tshionso, mutangile televizion anyi muteleje tshisanji, kudi anu malu a terorisme anyi tshinyangu, malu a mvita ne makuabu a tshikisu. Nansha wewe kabidi udi mua kuikala ne yebe ntatu. Tshilejilu, udi mua kuikala usama anyi mufuishe. Nunku, udi mua kudiumvua anu bu Yobo, wakafika too ne ku diamba ne: “makenga mmampite.”—Yobo 10:15, MMM.
Udi mua kudiebeja ne:
- Ke malu avua Nzambi musue buanyi meme ne bua bantu bakuabu anyi?
- Nkuepi kundi mua kupeta diambuluisha b
... 
to. Nzambi mmulaye bua kuenza malu aa. Bible udi umvuija mushindu waenzaye.
Kadi Bible udi utuambuluisha mu mishindu ya bungi. Udi mua kukuambuluisha bua kuikala ne nsombelu mulenga menemene nansha lelu’eu. Anji vulukabi ntatu ne makenga audi nawu. Tshilejilu, udi mua kuikala mupangile mfranga, udi ne bilumbu mu dîku, masama anyi madilu. Bible udi mua kukuleja mua kupita bimpe ne ntatu eyi ne udi mua kukuambuluisha bualu udi wandamuna bimpe nkonko bu mudi idi ilonda eyi:
- Tutu tukenga bua tshin
...
Padibu bafila mvese mu mukanda eu, nomba wa kumpala udi ulua panyima pa dîna dia mukanda udi uleja nshapita ne udi ulonda udi uleja mvese. Tshilejilu: “2 Timote 3:16” udi umvuija mukanda muibidi wa Timote, nshapita 3, mvese wa 16.
Wewe ukeba mvese idibu bafile mu mukanda eu, newibidilangane ne Bible lukasa. Bua tshinyi kubenga mene kuenza programe wa kubala Bible dituku dionso? Wewe ubala nshapita isatu anyi itanu tshianana dituku dionso, udi mua kujikija kubala Bible mujima mu tshidimu tshimue.

The total number of speakers was estimated at 6. However, the differences in Tshiluba within the area are minor, consisting mostly of differences in tones and vocabulary, and speakers easily understand one another. Both dialects have subdialects. Additionally, there is also a pidginised variety of Tshiluba, [4] especially in cities, where the everyday spoken Tshiluba is enriched with French words and even words from other languages, such as Lingala or Swahili. TSHIBUMBA TSHIA NSENTEDI (TSHIA KULONGA) Ngondo 6 2016
Mu nimero eu mudi biena-bualu bia kulonga kutuadijila mu dia 1 too ne dia 28 ngondo wa 8 wa 2016.
Mu bikondo bia kale, batendeledi ba Nzambi ba lulamatu bavua bambe anyi benze malu avua manyingalaje bakuabu. Bilejilu bia mu Bible ebi bidi mua kutulongesha tshinyi?
Muntu udi ne kalondo ka mâyi a mukanda ka mufundi ne bantu basambombo badi ne bia mvita bia kutayisha nabi badibu baleje mu tshikena kumona tshia Yehezekele badi tshimfuanyi tshia banganyi?

Muntu uvua mufue mu kapia kavua kapite mu dilolo dia matuku abidi ni anayi ngondo muinayi mu kalasa ka mwanga, kadi mu tshimenga tshia Dilala, mu Kolwezi tshimenga tshikulu tshia provense wa Lualaba. Glodie Maloba, mulongi wa mu kalasa ka kisambobo wa mu tulasa tua malu a nshindamenu, wakaya kushiyanga na na biapanuapa panyima pa dienza mudimu kudi ba minganga.
Pakumvua mfumu wa tshididi wa mu ditunga dia Congo Andy Bemba ne kanyinganyinga bua bualu ebu, kakashala ne dielakana to anyi ditala to. “Ndi mumvue lumu lua kanyinganyinga lua lufu lua Glodie Maloba, mulongi wa mu Tshilongelu tshinene tshia Mwanga udi mufue panyima pa dienza mudimu wa luondapu. Lufu lua mushindu eu ludi ne bua kukemesha…
Dilotwa dyājimine! Balale mu ditalala, muanjelu wanyi mukese”, Andy Bemba wakamba mu twitter wende
Bua kuvuluka, bungi bua bantu badi bakenga ne bafue mu kapia aka kudi mpindieu lukama makumi abidi ni itangu .

Kabadi kakulu ka mu tshimenga tshia Kinshasa Gombe kakangata dipangadika dia mushinga mukole mu tshilumbu tshivua pankatshi pa bantu babidi bua dipanyisha dia lupangu ludi mu nimero wa 340 wa plan wa tshimenga tshia Barumbu.
Bantu Badi mu tshilumbu etshi badi babidi: mbena Société Immobilière Moderne Sarl. Muleji mpala wa Mompempe Lufungula Hugues ne Sukami Gedeon muleji mpala wa Ndongo Empesa
kabadi Aka kadi kaleja : Sukami Gedeon uvua mupeshe Société Immobilière Moderne Sarl nzubu. Udi wamba ne: Sukami Gedeon kavua muye ku kabadi to, ne kakuvua muntu nansha umue uvua umuakuila mu mikenji uvua muaba au to.
Bua kabadi, Société Immobilière Moderne Sarl uvua musumbe nzubu eu mu dia 5 ngondo wa dikumi ne muibidi mu 2021. Nzubu eu udi ne mukanda wa dianyisha wa ABK 5 Folio 54.
Panyima pa dipanyisha dia bintu ebi, bakapatula mukanda mukuabu wa dianyishila bua mukanda wa ABK 16 Folio 45 mu dîna diende.
Kabadi kakamona malu avua kaayi apetangana mu mukanda eu, bu mudi: meena a bantu bavuabu kabayi batele munkatshi mua bantu bavua babuele, ne bilema bivua mu tshiena-bualu tshia kabadi. Kabidi, adresse wa lupangu alu ki mmukumbane to, ne matuku adibu bafunde mu mikanda kayena umvuangana to.
Kabadi aka kadi kaleja kabidi ne: bilondeshile dipangadika edi, bavua bumbushe Bahole Ruvuna Bahizi Jimmy ne muena nzubu wende mu lupangu luabu lua 22 bis lua Avenue Aérodrome mu tshimenga tshia Barumbu.
KBG

Idi yaleba ha gutangiza egi masugu etu a uvuala mbaakhala ivuo nu ivuo, enji egi “masugu abola” awa ana gubuila athu gula akola ha mavu awa a Satana, mbaashigo gutubuila. (Mulo 12:1) Gula udi muvuala, wana gumona egi udi nu tangua diavula dia gudihagela mafelela a mu nyuma, gifua gudihana tangua diagasue mu mudimo wa gulongesa mbimbi ya Nzambi?
“Luendu luabola ludi mubuila” mukuta wetu agasue, ikhale athu awa adi mavuala. (Mulo 9:11) “Mushigo mujiya mionyo yenu hamene mbayikhala luholo’tshi.” (Yak 4:14) Hene, utangizago egi gulandula ndaga jia mu nyuma gushigo nu ndando. Nginenu mu “mufulo wakoma udi mutuameza gu mudimo” kumbi udi waguzulula. (1 Kol 16:9, NW) Mbawushigo muvua kinene mukunda nu desizio wazudi.
Mafelela a mu nyuma wajiya gudihagela:
Gulongesa mbimbi ya Nzambi mu zuelelo diko
Mudimo wa muvundji wa njila
Gungina mu khalasa dia gulongesa mbimbi ya Nzambi
Mudimo wa gutunga njinzo jia Ufumu
Mudimo gu Betele
Mudimo wa mutadi muwendji

Bena Isalele bakaluangana mvita ya bungi ne bena lukuna babo, kadi bakadi bapitshi muinshi mua bulombodi bua 
... 
ge bidi bituvuluija bua malu manene akatuenzela Musungidi wetu. Paulo wakadi wela meji bua malu aa pakambeye ne, "Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto, wakadifila bua malu mabi etu bua yeye atusungile munkatshi mua tshikondo etshi tshibi bu mudi disua dia Nzambi Tatu wetu. ...
anyi buende muntu ku bupianyi buende. Nzambi wakasankisha bantu bende, wakabajadika mu bupianyi buabo.
Muena mudimu mukuabo wa Nzambi wa kueyemena, Paulo, wakamba ne, "Nakuluangana mvita muimpe, nakushikija tshidikijilu tshia lubilu, nakulamata ditabuja; tshidi kumpala mpindiewu ntshifulu tshia butumbi tshia buakane bua Nzambi tshintekela, tshialua Mukelenge mulumbuludi muakane kumpa dituku diadia; kena utshimpa anu meme, kadi neatshipe bonso kabidi badi basue dimueneka diende" (2 Timote 4:7,8).

Dimanyisha dia ditunga dia Kongu kupitshila ku nvita kuluseka kudi diba dijuka
Bukalenga bwa ditunga dia Kongu wa mungalata, didi dikala dia ngata dimanyisha dia bukalenga bwa Rwanda, difile mu matuku makumi abidi ne anadi a ngondu wa dikumi wa tshidimu tshia 2022. Budi ashisha bu fila madiajika aa nungu:
1. Bidibilejikibua patoka buanyi dimanyisha edi, didi dikala, ditabija bukalenga bua Rwanda didi dikala diela ditunga dia Kongu nvita kupitshila, ba ntomboji ba M23.
Nengu, mushindukayi bukalen
... 
anji enda.
3. Ngikadilu wa ditunga dia Rwanda udi mukila utshiompakana nyi mapanganyika mangata munjila wakukeba ditalala mu bimenga ebi : Nairobi, Luanda pashisha New-York kubu lombondi bua mfumu wa ditunga dia France, Emmanuel Macron, kokueeku, bisumbu ebi bivua bipetangana bua kujikija bisumbu bia bantomboji, popamua nyi M 23.
Bukalenga bua ditunga dia Kongu wa mungalata budi bwikala bu manyisha nyi dijadika buanyi kusakila kua bantu mu lukinu kupitshila ku kansungansunga kakuena kusanganyibu
...
 pamua nyi kulwila bujima ne budikadila bua ditunga, bua kumona kujikija ndululu mujula kudi tshisumbu tshia bantomboji ba M23 nyi bukalenga bua ditunga dia Rwanda budi bwikala bu batwila panyima.
Pashisha, Kongu wa mungalata udi wangata bumudi ntemu, matunga masanga, nyi wambulwila buloba bujima buanyi bumanya ne ditalala pamua nyi disomba diakane kuluseka kudi diba dijuka, didi dikala ya mushinga mukole bua dienzeka dia Masungula a 2023.
Patrick Muyaya,
Ngoma momekela mianda ya dikobolola.

- Kinshasa: Didia dibi ki didi dinianga bukola bua mubidi bua bana mu buloba bujima .
- Kananga:musumba wa bena bukalenga mumbuka lelu ku kananga baya batangila muaba uvua njiu muenzenka ku kole mu polovense wa sankuru .
- Bunia :bena kasumbu ka diluisha ebola mu territoire wa Mambasa badi ne lutatu bua kuenza mudimu wabu . ku lumua luseka kudi ba mai mai ne ku luseka lukuabu kudi bamua ba mfumu ba kabukulu badi basaka bena ditunga bua kubabunda .
- Butembo: Santala ibidi ya tshitudilu bua ebola ku Butembo ivua minzulula .
- Beni:Ditua mpanda Institut National de Recherche Biomédicale mu dilondolola babedi badi batshimuna ebola ki dimua dia ku malu manena adi ditunga dia France ne mua kuenza bua kujikija disama edi .
- Beni: Ku Nord Kivu , tshisalu tshipia tshipia tshidi dina ne Johnson & Johnson ne tshibuejibua mu matuku adi alua mu luidi lua diluisha ebola .

Mudimu kayi wa tshimamuenda wa bukalenga mu mpolovensa ne mushindu kayi udibu batshilongoolola?
RJk : Mireille Bukasa, kanungu ka 197 ka meyi makulu a ditunga dia congo wa mungalata kadi kaleja ne tshimamuenda wa bukalenga mu mpolovensa ntshidi dilongoloola midimu mu mpolovensa ne tshikontonona bukalenga mu mpolovensa ne mu midimu ya mbulamatadi ne ya tshianana. badi bakauata mudimu muaba ewu badi bababikila ne ba tshipuitamunuamfuanka ba mpolovensa. badi babasungula kudi bantu bonso musangu umu
... 
gela bua bobu kusungula muntu bua yeya kulua tshipuitamunua mfuanka mu mpolovensa ?
Rjk : Mireille Bukasa, kanungu ka 148 ne ka 149 ka meyi a masungula nkaleja ne liste ya mpala ya aba badi ne tshia kushala bua tshipuitamunuamfuanka badi bayifila kudi bena bisumbu bia tshididi anyi nsangilu ya bisumbu bia tshididi anyi muntu nkayenda. Bua kufuluija , aba badi basua kufila mpala bua kuikala ba tshipuitamunuamfuanka ba mu mpolovensa badi ne tshia kukumbaja bintuebi, kuikala muena congo, kuikala ne
...
a makuta bua kufila mpala bua kuikala tshipuitamunuamfuanka wa mfualanga ya muena congo binunu 55 biela mu difueta dia mbulamatadi., mukanda mufunda kudi balombodi ba tshisumbu tshia tshididi anyi nsangilu wa bisumbu bia tshididi udi ujadika ne udi muitabija bua kufila mpala.

Mulombodi wa malu a disangila, dîku ne bana, Mireille Masangu Bibi Muloko wakenza muyuki muimpe ne Mumanyishi wa UNICEF mu ditunga dia RDC, Grant Philippe LEAITY, mu Dimue dia matuku muanda mukulu ngondo muitanu mu Kabine kende ka mudimu, kadi nushala kumanya buase Diyukidilangana edi divua ditangila dienza mudimu dia bakaji ba mu ditunga dia Congo mu malu a disungula ne dimvuangana dia malu adibu ne bua kuenza pamue mu mudimu udi pankatshi pa ministre wa malu a bantu ne UNICEF.
“Bu muvua ministre mushintuluke, tuvua ne bua kuindila bua kuyukila bua bidi bitangila malu onso atuvua tuenza bua mudimu wetu. Tshilejilu, tshidimu tshishale, tuvua benze mudimu pamue bua kubikila bantu bua kubuela mu tshisangilu tshia bana betu ba bakaji, tshivua tshienzeke ku ndekelu kua ngondo wa dikumi ni umue mu nzubu wa tshilala benyi wa mu musulu. Kudi kabidi tshilumbu tshia mushindu wa disungula dia bantu bakaji, ne dienza dia mikanda ya disungula, bikalaku kakuyi bana, bua disungula dia tshidimu etshi, kudi kabidi bantu bakuabu badi basue kuenza mudimu pamue, bu mudi tshidimu tshishale tuvua bamone dibanjija dia tshisangilu tshia ditunga bua bana ne dia parlement, bivua bua kuakula bua mushindu wa kuya kumpala ne malu aa onso mu njila mupiamupia”.
Mumanyishi wa UNICEF wa mu ditunga dia congo wakanyisha dijinga divuaye nadi bua kuyukila ne bantu aba ne wakangata mpunga eu bua kuanyisha dijadikibua dia Muloko bu mulombodi wa Tshibambalu tshia malu a bantu.
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

“Bu muikala malu mabi enda avulangana, dinanga dia ba bungi nedikepe.”—MAT. 24:12.
MISAMBU: 60, 135
1, 2. a) Mêyi a Yezu adi mu Matayi 24:12 avua atangila tshiakumpala banganyi? b) Mmunyi mudi mukanda wa Bienzedi uleja ne: bena Kristo ba kumpala ba bungi bavua balame dinanga diabu dikole? (Tangila tshimfuanyi tshia ntuadijilu tshia tshiena-bualu.)
PAVUA Yezu pa buloba, wakaleja muvua bantu mua kujingulula ‘nshikidilu wa ndongoluelu wa malu eu.’ Mu malu avuaye mutele, wakamba ne: “Dinanga dia ba 
... 
ushindu kayi, uvua anu ulama dinanga diende bua Yehowa dikole. Uvua mueyemene ‘Nzambi wa busambi buonso, udi utusamba mu makenga etu onso.’ (2 Kol. 1:3, 4) Mmunyi mutudi mua kuidikija Paulo?
10. Mmunyi mutudi mua kulama dinanga dietu bua Yehowa dikole?
10 Paulo wakaleja mushindu umue utudi mua kulama dinanga dietu bua Nzambi dikole pakafundaye ne: “Nusambile misangu yonso.” Wakalua kufunda kabidi ne: “Nunanukile mu disambila.” (1 Tes. 5:17; Lomo 12:12) Bua tshinyi disambila didi ditusemeja pabui
...
na lukuka. (2 Tim. 3:1, 2) Bu mutudi bena Kristo, tudi ne bua kudienzeja bikole bua kutungunuka ne kunanga Yehowa, Dîyi diende, ne bena Kristo netu. Mutudi bapange bupuangane, imue misangu tudi mua kubenga kupetangana ne bena Kristo netu mu tumalu tukese. Kadi bu mutudi banangangane, netudienzeje bua kujikija bilumbu bionso ne bulenga ne pa lukasa. (Ef. 4:32; Kolos. 3:14) Katulekedi nansha kakese dinanga dietu dikepela! Kadi tutungunuke ne kunanga Yehowa, Dîyi diende, ne bena Kristo netu bikole.

Yehowa gashigo nu lutondo. (Makal 10:34, 35) Muene wana gutshigina athu “a mu gifutshi giagasue nu a mu giphuta giagasue . . . nu a mazuelelo agasue.” (Yat 7:9) Hene, mu hungu, Aklisto ajiyilego gukhala nu umbalagaji mukatshi diawo nga hazonda. (Yak 2:1-4) Tudi muhana Nzambi mersi ha ndaga malongo enji adi gutukuatesa ha gujinga mu phaladiso ya mu nyuma, enji tudi mumona luholo athu adi mubalumuna makalegelo awo mu phaladiso yene. (Yesh 11:6-9) Luholo tudi mukalagala ngolo ha gukatula umbalagaji wa luholo luagasue mu mitshima yetu, tudi mumonesa diago egi tuana gulandula makalegelo a Nzambi—Ef 5:1, 2.

Champion Iron Limited apu uesha shaputue tshetshi utinamuat auennua utipatshimunnua kie nenua eka eshinakuannit tshetshi mishituepanitakannit ute nikaitusseu-katshitapatakanit-mashinaikannat. Tshika uapatanitinan eshi-atusseshtamat ne ka ishi-katshitinamat auen utipatshimun.
Uauitamatsheun shaputue ka utinakanit mak ka pitepanitakanit
Tatuau niatshi-uapatameku nikaitusseu-katshitapatakanit-mashinaikannan, shaputue nitashu-pitukatanan ne auen utipatshimun kiatshitinamati ne e uitakanit tshikaitus
... 
tshitapatakanit-mashinaikan uetshipanieku. Muku, apu tshissenimitan auen ne tshin. Ne eshi-katshitinamat aimuna nuitshikunan tshetshi uitamat aishpanit mak tshetshi ueuetashtaiat ne nikaitusseu-katshitapatakanit-mashinaikannan. Miam mate pashkapatamati, takuaki peiku tshekuan anite nikaitusseu-katshitapatakanit-mashinaikannat eka ishpish natshi-uapatakaniti, nipa tshi itshenenan ne atusseuakan kie ma tshetshi ueuetashtaiat anu tshetshi uitshikuht anitshenat nenua niatshi-uapatahk.
Uin uetshit au
...
sseu-katshitapatakanit-mashinaikanit, tshin anite e uinikauin, kie ma tshetshi itishaimin tshin tipan tshitipatshimun anite peiku etashiht mamu ka taht kaitusseht anite Champion Iron Limited. Nenua aimuna petshitinakaniti peikutau ishinakuan ne ka ishi-pimutenanut miam nenua kutaka eshi-mishkutunamatunanut, ne ua issishuenanut uin nenu auen tipan utipatshimun mak eka ka tshi mishituepanitakannit. Apu tshika ut mishituepanitaiat tshin tshitipatshimun patush tshin natuenitamin tshetshi ne tutamat.

MU dia 26/3/1937, bantu balume babidi bakavua batshioke bikole bavua bendesha mashinyi abu manene avua ne mpuishi ya bungi bitekete bitekete batangile mu Sydney, mu ditunga dia Australie. Tshidimu tshijima katshia bumbuka mu tshimenga etshi, mbenze kilometre mipite pa 19300 bapitshila mu imue miaba ya kule menemene ne mu bimenga bivua ne bikunakuna bia mu ditunga edi. Bantu aba kabavua baye bua kumanya miaba anyi bua kuendakana to. Arthur Willis ne Bill Newlands bavua anu bampanda-njila babidi b
... 
ku dikalu, ku moto ne ku mashinyi. Wakatuadija mudimu wa kuyisha munkatshi mua bantu ba kumpala ba mu Australie ne kuenzaye bisumbu bipiabipia, uvua mumanyike bikole ne bavua bamunemeka miaba yonso ya kule ya mu Australie.
BAKATANTAMENA NTATU
Ditunga dia Australie ke ditunga didi ne bantu bakese menemene pa buloba bujima, nangananga mu miaba ya kule menemene. Kadi bantu ba Yehowa mbaleje mudibu badisuike bua kuyisha bantu ba miaba ya kule ya mu ditunga edi.
Bampanda-njila aba, Stuart Keltie ne W
...
 Yehowa. Udi wamba kabidi ne: “Nsombelu mmuimpe menemene paudi ne bintu bikese bia ku mubidi. Bikala Yezu muitabe bua kulala pambelu pavuabi bikengela, tuetu petu tudi ne bua kuikala ne disanka dia kuenza bia muomumue bikala mudimu udibu batupesha utulomba bua kuenza nanku.” Ke tshidi bampanda-njila ba bungi benze. Ku diambuluisha dia tshisumi tshia bampanda-njila aba, lumu luimpe ndufike muaba wonso wa mu ditunga edi, luambuluisha bantu ba bungi bua kuikalabu ku luseke lua Bukalenga bua Nzambi.

Makenga akangata bena Tesalonike, akadiundisha ditabusha diabu, akatamba kudiundisha dinanga diabu ne akalesha ditekemena diabu. Tshiakadibu bapangile ntshinyi ne mbua tshinyi mupostolo udi umona bimpe bua kubatumina kukanda muibidi ? Musangu eu, ditekemena kadiena ditedibue, nansha disanka dia Nyuma Muimpe (fuany. 1 Tesal. 1. 3, 6 ndekelu wende). Paulo udi uteka ku mpala kuabu mu mukanda eu bulelela budi mua kutamba kutabulusha meshi aa mu mitshima yabu. Kutamba kua muena luk
... 
difile midima ku nyuma ya bantu : kabakuitabuja ku bulelela, nebitabushe ku dishima. Mupostolo udi ukumbasha ne : bualu busokoka bua bupidia butshidi buenza mudimu wabu (fuany. 1 Yone 2. 18). Kadi « utshiena ukanda bua dimueneka diabu », Nyuma muimpe, udi wimanyika ditomboka dia bualu bubi mu buloba. Pikalaye wakumuka pa buloba ne ekelesia, pa diba adi bupidia kabuakuikala ne kudikanda. Kadi ditapuluka kayi didi pankatshi pa bukole ebu bua Satana (mv. 1-12) ne mudimu wa Nzambi Tatu wetu (mv. 13-
...
kuende ekelesia wakatambaye kunanga (mv. 5).
Ne mikanda ya bena Tesalonike, tudi tufika ku ndekelu kua mikanda ya kafundila Paulo ekelesia muanda mutekete mishilashilangane. Dishilashilangana divule dia nsombelu wa dilongesha dia buena kilisto didi diakudibuamu, kubanga ku diangata dia lupandu mu mukanda wa bena Lomo, tô ne ku butumbi budi buamba kumueneka. . Malongesha aa onso adi ne mushinga munene bua bualu buetu kabidi. Mukelenge atupeshe bukole bua kualama bua tuetu kujalama bimpe ! (2. 15)

... 
iya mwanda nadi mupwe kulonga Fwalanse mu Quebec. Anka mususa umune tubamwene’shi bakwetu bebungi ba mu dino eumbo babadi abakula nka penda ludimi lwabetanyinaa bu Créole a mu Haïti. Byabya bwatudya kufuba mudimo wetu wa bu misionere kalolo, bibadi abitungu’shi tulongye ludimi lwa bantu ba mu eumbo mwatudi. Tubalongyele lwanka, atwe nkupeta bipeta bibuwa bwa kwitatshisha kwetu.
