Mukanda wa—Annuaire 1994, awakula mu esaki dya 255 shi: “Atutekye baba boso banyingiile mu mufubo munda mwa bipwa bebungi’shi: ‘Nyingayi mashimba na tanutadilanga maasa eenu aabofula, mwanda nwi na efuto dikata bwa mudimo wenu.’—2 Myanda 15:7.” Ami na Happy twi na kitshibilo kya kulonda ano mayi na kunyingisha bangi bwabadya kwialonda.

“Malunda mabi adi anyanga bibidilu bimpe.” —1 KOLINTO 15:33.
MISAMBU: 73, 119
1. Tudi mu tshikondo kayi?
TUDI mu “bikondo bibi bidi bikole mua kupita nabi.” Katshia “matuku a ku nshikidilu” atuadija mu 1914, malu mmanyanguke pa buloba bikole menemene kupita ne muvuabi kumpala. (2 Timote 3:1-5) Tudi bajadike ne: malu neatungunuke anu ne kunyanguka, bualu mulayi wa buprofete wa mu Bible udi wamba ne: “Bantu babi ne badi badinga bakuabu nebatungunuke ne kunyanguka bibi menemene.”—2 Timote 3:13.
2. 
... 
a budi butuambuluisha bua kuenza malu atufikisha ku dipeta muoyo wa tshiendelele. Yezu wakalomba Yehowa mu disambila wamba ne: “Bualu ebu budi bumvuija muoyo wa tshiendelele: bafike ku dikumanya wewe, Nzambi umuepele mulelela, ne yeye uuvua mutume, Yezu Kristo.” (Yone 17:3) Yehowa udi wenza mudimu ne bulongolodi buende bua kutupetesha tshintu tshionso tshidi tshituambuluisha bua kufika ku dimumanya. Tshilejilu, tudi ne bintu bia bungi bu mudi: bibejibeji, broshire, mikanda, video ne malu a ku En
...
tuena ne bua kudia bulunda ne muntu udi kayi munange Yehowa to. Tudi ne bana betu ba balume ne ba bakaji miliyo ya bungi badi ne lulamatu kudi Yehowa batudi mua kudia nabu bulunda. Nebatuambuluishe bua ‘kushindama mu ditabuja’ mu bikondo bikole ebi. (1 Kolinto 16:13; Nsumuinu 13:20) Elabi meji disanka dituikala nadi patuapanduka ku nshikidilu wa ndongoluelu mubi wa malu eu, ne kuikala ne muoyo mu bulongolodi bupiabupia bua Yehowa! Bushuwa, bidi ne mushinga bua kuepuka malunda mabi matuku etu aa.

YEHOWA NZAMBI mmusue bua batendeledi bende bikale ne ditalala. Mmusue bua bakebe ditalala munkatshi muabu. Padibu benza nunku, tshisumbu tshia bena Kristo netshikale mu ditalala. Ditalala edi didi dikoka bantu ba bungi mu tshisumbu.
Tshilejilu, mpaka manga kampanda wa mu Madagascar wakamona ditalala divua munkatshi mua bantu ba Yehowa, kudiambilaye ne: ‘Meme musue kubanga kutendelela, etshi ke tshitendelelu tshingabuela.’ Pakapita bidimu, wakalekela kutendelela bademon, kushintululaye malu mu di
... 
ja bua kutshijikija.
Mu Bible mudi mibelu ya bungi mimpe ya tshia kuenza. Ya bungi ya kudiyi idi ilomba kueyemena nyuma muimpe wa Nzambi bua tufike ku dileja “dimuma dia nyuma.” Ngikadilu ya dimuma edi ke: “dinanga, disanka, ditalala, muoyo mule, bulenga, buimpe, ditabuja, bupole, didikanda.” (Gal. 5:22, 23) Elabi meji bua bualu ebu. Mashinyi adi enda bimpe padibu bele biamu biawu mafuta. Mu mushindu wa muomumue, mbipepele menemene bua kujikija bilumbu bietu ne kuikala ne malanda mimpe patudi ne
...
bu bapete. Wakabakankamija bua benze nunku ‘ne didipuekesha dionso ne bupole buonso, ne lutulu, balekelelangana bilema mu dinanga, badienzeja ne muoyo umue bua kulama buobumue bua kudi nyuma mu tshisuikidi tshia ditalala.’ (Ef. 4:1-3) “Tshisuikidi tshia ditalala” tshidi bantu ba Yehowa natshi ntshintu tshia mushinga mukole. Nanku tuenzayi tshionso tshitudi mua kuenza bua kutshikolesha bikole ne kujikija tshilumbu kayi tshionso tshidi mua kujuka pankatshi petu ne bana betu ba balume ne ba bakaji.

Mushilangane ne wa kumudilu, mukanda eu muibidi udi ubululuka mu tshikondo tshia dishimbuka mudi mupostolo mu nzubu wa lukanu, ushikisha dilumbila diandi, udi utangila dinyanguka lubilu dia bumanyishi buakakuatshilaye mudimu. Kadi Nzami wakadiambuluisha ne dinyanguka edi, diakabanga kumueneka mu tshikondo tshia bapostolo bua tuetu kupeta mukanda eu udi utulesha njila wa tuetu kuendela, ne mayisha a kukankamika ditabusha mu « tshikondo etshi tshibi » tshidi tshietu lelu (shap. 
... 
ajadiki ba dianyishibua edi kudiye. « Muaba udi bupidia ne dinyanguka biûle, muena kilisto wa lulamatu udi utapuluka nau ». Bitangilangane ne bantu, udi umusha malu mabi abo ; ne nkuka, udi uyinyema ; ne malu mimpe a Nzambi udi ualonda ; ne bena kuitabusha bakuabo udi ubakeba, udisangisha kudibu, ne ukukuila popamue n’abo (H.R.). Mu tshienzedi, mv. 19-22, yakambuluisha bana ba Nzambi ba bungi bua kumuka munkatshi mua bulongolodi bua ntendelelu ya patupu ya buena kilisto ne kusangishibua kudi Muk
...
kimana nandi (mv. 16). Buonso buabo bakatangalaka. Dema mene, wakamulekela mumane kusua malu a pa buloba. Katuena mua kuikala munkatshi mua badi basua malu a pa buloba a tshikondo etshi (mv. 10), ne kuikala po pamue munkatshi mua badi basua dimueneka dia Mukelenge (mv. 8).
Ne mukanda udi ujika ne dikuatshisha dinene dia mu tshikondo tshia dishimbuka : ngasa. Wakadi muoyo wa mupostolo (shap. 1. 2), udi kabidi kulayangana kuende n’abo (mv. 22). Ngasa eu kabidi ikale kudi muntu ne muntu wa kutudi !

Dilongesha dia matuku muanda mutekete dia bulombodi didibu balongesha kudi Mulongeshi Matata Ponyo Mapon, dipesha balombodi ba midimu ya muaba eu malongesha manene a bumfumu.
Malongesha aa avuabu balongolole kudi Iniversite wa bena Mishonyi wa mu Congo, avua mapeteshe bena midimu mpunga wa kuvudija dimanya diabu ku diambuluisha dia miyuki mimpe ne dia ngenyi mimpe.
Mu biena-bualu bivuabu bakonkonone muvua malongesha adi atangila bumfumu ne mushindu muimpe wa kuenza mudimu ne pa dîba, biambuluisha bua kukonkonona tshilumbu etshi bimpe menemene.
Diyukidilangana edi didi ne tshipatshila tshia kukolesha mamanya a balombodi ba miaba mishilangane bua kuenza malu mimpe mu midimu yabu ne mu misoko yabu.
Gloire Kabongo

RDC: tukadi mutshituka kayi masungula? Didi Manara utokesha kongo ya bantu
Tshisumbu tshia Masungula (CENI) ku diambuluisha dia mulombodi muibidi Didi Manara Linga, tshiakenza muyuki ne bamanyishi anyi ba kamuna kamba mu Dibidi dia dikumi ni inayi ngondo muisatu eu mu nzubu wa tshisangilu wa Abbé MALU MALU bua kufila butoke pa mushindu wa kumanya bantu badi basungula bua masungula d mu ngondo wa kimimi ni muibidi wa 2023.
Malu abidi avua pa tshizubu tshia muyuki ewu :
Tshitupa tshia kumpala tshi
... 
o.
Pa kumbusha bungi bua bantu badi bafundila ku babende, CENI mmukose bantu batue ku 70 pa lukama badi bafundila anyi bakadi bangata carte kabu mu République démocratique du Congo mujima.
Mulombodi muibidi wa komite eu udi wamba ne: eu ke musangu wa kumpala udi bena mu ditunga dia Congo badi basombele ku babende badifundisha. Kadi udi utujadikila ne: malu onso adi enzeka bimpe ne muntu udi utangila bimpe.
Didi Manara wakela mêyi onso avua mulombodi wa CENI Corneille Nanga muambe ne: udi
Uleja m
...
ke mu karte ka divota, wakakula bua tshiena-bualu tshia 6 tshia mikenji ya malu à masungula tshidi tshiamba ne: muntu udi mua kuikala ne divota anu yeye mufunde mu liste wa divota ne muikale ne karte ka divota. Bikala mukanda eu mujimine, bena mudimu badi bafila kopi.
Tudi tuamba ne: Commission électorale nationale et indépendante udi witaba ne: disungula didi dienzeka mu tshikondo tshia mikenji ya ditunga ne udi ubenga malu onso adi mulombodi wa CENI Corneil Nanga wamba.
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

Yehova wādimine budimi mu kifuko kitwa bu Edena. Mu buno budimi mwādi maluba mavule, mityi mivule, ne banyema bavule. Kupwa, Leza wāpanga ku biloba mwana-mulume mubajinji, Adama, ne kumupūja mu myulu yandi. Le uyukile byālongekele? Mwana-mulume’wa wāikala ke muntu mūmi! Yehova wāpele Adama mwingilo wa kutala budimi, kadi Leza wāmulombwele enike banyema bonso majina.
Yehova wāpele Adama kijila kimo kya mvubu. Wālombwele Adama amba: ‘Ubwanya kudya bipa bya ku mityi yonso kutalula’mo’tu umo kete. Shi udye ku uno mutyi umo, ukafwa.’
Mwenda mafuku, Yehova wānena’mba: ‘Nkenongela Adama mukwashi.’ Wālādika Adama tulo tukatampe, kupwa Leza wāyata Adama lupamvu, wāmupungila nalo mukaji. Dyandi dijina i Eva. Ba Adama ne Eva bāikala ke kisaka kibajinji. Le Adama wēivwene namani pa kumona wandi mukaji?
Adama wāsangele bininge, wānena’mba: ‘Tala byalonga Yehova na lupamvu lwami! Uno’ko! Ye muntu ungifwene.’Yehova wāsoñenye ba Adama ne Eva babutule bana ne kuyuja ntanda. Wādi usaka bengidile pamo mwanda wa kwalamuna ntanda yonso ikale ke paladisa, nansha’mba kifuko kilumbuluke, monka mwādi mwikadile budimi bwa Edena. Inoko kebyābwanikilepo. Mwanda waka? Tusa kuyuka myanda mivule mu shapita ulonda’ko.

Buloba ntshidimba tshisaatu tshia tshibwashibwashi tshidi tshinyunguluka ku diiba. Ki mwaba umwepele udi moyo. Buloba budi bunyunguluka pambidi pa diiba mu matuku nkama isatu makumi asambombo ne itanu,nkama ibidi makumi atanu ne isambombo. Budi kabidi budinyungulukila mu dituku dimwe ditshintshika mu meba makumi abidi ne asatu ne tusunsa makumi atanu ne muanda muteketa. Dinyungulukila edi didi dia meeba makumi abidi ne inayi. Mbutambe kwinama ne tusunsa makumi abidi ne asatu ki tshidi tsienza ne kwikala tshikondo tshia mushipu anyi tshia nvula.

1. Tudi ne bua kutendelela Nzambi bua tshinyi?
Nzambi mulelela ke Nzambi utu mufuke bintu bionso. Kena ne tshibangidilu, kena ne ndekelu. (Musambu 90:2) Lumu luimpe ludi mu Bible ludi lufumina kudiye. (1 Timote 1:11) Bu mudi Nzambi ke udi mutupeshe muoyo, tudi ne bua kumutendelela anu yeye.
2. Nzambi utu mushindu kayi?
Muntu nansha umue katu muanji kumona Nzambi to, bualu udi Nyuma; mmumue ne: mmuntu udi mutupite tuetu bantu kule ne kule. (Yone 1:18; 4:24) Nansha nanku, tudi tumuenena ngikadilu 
... 
eja, Mvidi Mukulu, Mukalenge, Maweja-Nangila anyi Mfumu. Kadi pavuabu bafunde Bible, dîna dia Nzambi divuamu misangu mitue ku 7000. Yezu wakamanyisha bantu dîna dia Nzambi pavuaye ubalongesha.
4. Yehowa utuku utuelela meji anyi?
Bu mudi makenga enda avulangana, bidiku bileja ne: Nzambi kena utangila malu etu anyi? Bamue bantu badi bela meji ne: Nzambi udi utukengesha bua kututeta, kadi ki mmuomu to.
Nzambi mmutue yonso wa kutudi mushinga bualu mmutupeshe tshipedi tshia kudisunguila malu. Katuena
...
angila malu a muntu ne muntu. (Musambu 65:2; 145:18) Utu musue kutubuikidila mibi yetu. Udi umona mutudi tudienzeja bua kumusankisha, nansha mututu imue misangu tumunyingalaja. Nunku, nansha mutudi bena mibi, tudi mua kulua balunda banene ba Nzambi.
Bu mudi Yehowa ke udi mutupeshe muoyo, yeye ke utudi ne bua kunanga bikole kupita muntu kayi yonso. (Mâko 12:30) Paudi ulonga malu a Nzambi ne wenza tshidiye ukulomba, udi uleja ne: udi munange Nzambi. Ke tshiakuambuluisha bua kusemena pabuipi nende.

Udi mua kudiebeja ne: ‘Bua tshinyi mbimpe bua meme kusambila bikala Nzambi mumanye malu onso, mumanye too ne meji anyi ne majinga anyi?’ Lukonko elu nduimpe. Yezu kavuaku muambe ne: Nzambi “mmumanye binudi nadi dijinga kumpala mene kua nuenu kumulombabi” anyi? (Matayi 6:8) Mukalenge Davidi wa mu Isalele wa kale uvua mumanye bualu ebu, ne wakafunda ne: “Kumpala kua ludimi luanyi kupatula dîyi, kadi tangila! Wewe Yehowa ukadi mudimanye bimpe.” (Musambu 139:4) Bua tshinyi tudi ne bua kusambila Nzam
... 
Kadi tudi ne bua kuikala batuishibue ne: anu bu muledi wa dinanga, Mufuki wetu neandamune ku majinga etu malelela mu dîba diakanyine ne mu mushindu muimpe.—Luka 11:11-13.
Nzambi udi mua kuandamuna mu mishindu itudi katuyi bamanye
Kadi netuambe tshinyi tuetu tusambila bua kupeta disulakana ku lutatu ludi kaluyi lujika? Tudiku mua kuamba diakamue ne: bu mudiku kakuyi diandamuna dia mu tshishima, Yehowa ki mmuandamune disambila dietu anyi? Tòo, tudi mua kuela meji bimpe, bualu Nzambi mmutuambuluish
...
udi ne bua kuikala batuishibue ne: Yehowa neandamune masambila etu mimpe tuetu batungunuke ne kumulomba ne ditabuja.
^ tshik. 3 Tuetu basue bua Nzambi ateleje masambila etu, tudi ne bua kudienzeja bua kutumikila mikenji yende. Tuetu benze nunku, netumone bukole budi nabu disambila anu mudibi bileja mu tshiena-bualu etshi. Kidyumu kyāletele Yesu kepadi kintu kya myaka 2 000, kikidi na mvubu mpata ne dyalelo. Tala ba Brayene ne Gloria mobefundila kukinga kisaka kyabo ku byaka byādyumwine Yesu.
I muswelo’ka walwile kisaka kimo kya bene Kidishitu ba dyalelo pa kulamata Leza ne kukimba bupeta?
Le i bika bibwanya kōna mumweno wetu wa ku mushipiditu ne kwitulengeja tuzoze ku mushipiditu ne kwikala na mwiendelejo mubi?
Yesu wāsekunwine mānga yabo mwanda wa tuboile’ko ñeni. Bintu byāfikīle mukaja Lota kebyādipo bya kumufikila. Kadi kebifwaninwepo netu kwitufikila.

1, 2. Muena Kristo yonso udi ne tshipatshila kayi? Fila tshilejilu.
NTSHINYI tshitu mamu ukeba padiye usungula bimuma mu tshisalu? Pamuapa, katu anu ukeba bimuma bia binene anyi bia mushinga mukese to. Kadi, utu ukeba bidi bimpe, bitshidi bipiabipia ne bikumbane bua kudia. Mmusue bua bimuma bikale bibobe mmumue ne: bikole.
Muena Kristo mushindame udi utungunuka ne kukeba mêyi manene a mu Bible adi mua ku
... 
bupia budi “bufukibue bilondeshile disua dia Nzambi mu buakane ne lulamatu bia bushuwa.” (Bala Efeso 4:22-24.) Bidi ne mushinga bua kuvuluka ne: Nzambi uvua muenze mudimu ne nyuma wende bua kulombola bafundi ba Bible. Nunku, padi muena Kristo ulonga Bible, nyuma muimpe wa Nzambi udi umuambuluisha bua kukolesha dimanya, dinanga ne malanda ende ne Yehowa.

Nete pet utat shashashish katutuakananit innuat nete katshishkutamatsheutshuapit mishta matshinnu kie tshitshue shakuenimutshenitakun ute Kanata. Shuka tshika ui uauitenan kie tshika ui tshishkutamuakananut akaneshaut katutuakanikuenit innuat nete katshishkutamatsheutshuapit, tshetshi eka uaunitshissitakanit eshpish kapiuenimakanikuenit innu auassat.
Nete ushkat etshitshipanit mishta-itshitashun kutunnuashu-peikushteu kaitashtet, ne aiamieutshuap Moravian Mission mak Inte
... 
in tshishe-utshimau ute nianipauian anutshish nasht apu ushtutatat ume ka eitutakuieku nitshisseniten minekash ishuapatimuat anitshenat kaitutet patetat katshishkutamatsheutshuapa ute Newfoundland mak Labrador kapiuenimakanit. Canada mak anitshenat Canada kassinu uetshit nasht apu ushtutamat. Apu ushtututshit uikanishimaut kie anitshenat ka shatshiat uikanishimau kie nenu utenau ka pet matenitak umennu kapiuenimakanit kie kaiakuiakananit auassa kie uikanishimaut.
Tshinuau kassinu etashieku nasht
...
shitipatshimunuau kie tshima uauitameku shuka kie tshetshi ma uauitshikuieku eshpish uauitimeku ka eitutakuieku.
Tshika ma unitshissitakanit ume kaishpanit kie tshima eka minuat ishpanit nete nikan. Nuishamananit kassinu Kanata akaneshauat tshetshi uitsheuimit nete nikan tshetshituteiaku – mamu tshetshi atussenanut innuat kie akaneshauat tshetshi minunakutaiaku nikan meshkananu.

- Kinshasa: Ndeka umua wa ditunga dia Afrique du sud uvua umbukila ku Beni uvua MONUSCO musomba mupanga dituka bimpa ku tshipalu tshia ndeka tshia Goma.
- Goma: Ku Nord-Kivu, tshiluilu tshia ditunga , tshifila mulubu wa mudimu wabu mukuata mu tshidimu tshia 2019 mu mudimu muenza mu territoires wa Masisi, Rutshuru, Nyiragongo ne Walikale.
- Kananga:Musumba umua wa bena tshiluilu tshia ditunga muya mu secteur wa Lusonge mu territoire wa Demba bua kujoja nsombelu bilondeshela malu adi ebna malu a manema a bantu bamba ne kudi basalayi ba ditunga badi bayobesha .
- Mbuji Mayi: Bantu banayi mbatapika bikola ne nzubu 12 mitua kapia munkatshi mua nzubu eyi , santala wa bukola bua mubidi ne ekelzia . bena muabu mbaniema muitu .
- Beni: Ku Nord Kivu, bakuata muntu umua ne disama dia ebola kunyima kua mbingu inayi ivuabu kabayi bapeta mubedi nansha umua mu tshipapu tshia bukola bua mubidi tshia Beni .
- Kinshasa: Université wa Kinshasa udi mushala lelu bu tshipela . balongi batu basombela ku home bakadi bumbuka.

NGUMU MU TSHIKOSO
1 Bunia : Basalayi ba tshiluilu tshia ditunga mbapona mu buteyi bua maluma ba mvita ba Codeco mu musoko wa Mokpa mu secteur wa Walendu Pisti
2 Kalemie : Bantu ba bungi ba mu musoko wa Moliro mbanyemena ku Moba batshina dikalangana dia basalayi ba tshiluili tshi a pa mayi ba mu Zambie
3 Kinshasa : Felix Antoine Tshisekedi uvua muakidila bena musumba wa ditunga dia Zambie balombola kudi mena wa mianda ya tshiala benyi
4 Kinshasa : Kudi bantu 51 badi ne disama dia covid 19 mu tshimenga tshia Kinshasa, bantu 4 bakadi bafua, badi ne tshia kuteta meku a bantu bonso badi ne disama edi
5 Kinshasa : Nouvelle dynamique de la société civile badi bela patoka nkuatshilu mubi wa mudimu wa bampulushi badibu batuma bua kulondakaja mikenyi ya mfumu wa ditunga
6 Kisangani : bena mu musoko wa Ango Ango badi ne bowa bualu ba Mbororo ba mu Centreafrique kabena banemeka dikanga dia mikalu wa ditunga nansha
7 Butembo : Bena nzubu wa dilambila bakadi baya kushila ba clients babu bia kudia ku nzubu wabu

Kukadi bidimu, bansonga miliyo ya bungi bavua bumbuke ku nzubu yabu bua kudifila mu mvita. Bavua badifile ne makanda abu onso bua dinanga dia matunga abu. Muena mu ditunga dia Amerike mukuabu uvua muye pende mu mvita eyi wakamba mu tshidimu tshia 1914 ne: “Ndi ne disanka dia bungi bua matuku mimpe adi kumpala kuanyi.”
Kadi matuku makese pashishe, disanka diabu diakandamuka dibungama dikole. Kakuvua muntu nansha umue uvua mudianjile kumona muvua bilulu bia bukole ebi mua kukuluka munkatshi mua bi
... 
bipeta bibi bia mvita. Bakajingulula ne: bamfumu ba mbulamatadi bavua babafuishishe, bamfumu babu ba bitendelelu bavua babashime ne ba komanda babu bavua babadile majangi. Mushindu kayi?
Bamfumu ba mbulamatadi bavua balaye ne: mvita ivua mua kufikisha bantu ku dikala ne nsombelu mupiamupia muimpe pa buloba. Mfumu wa mu Allemagne wakamba ne: “Tudi tuluangana mvita bua kupeta ditalala, bua kupeta budikadidi ne bua kuikala bimpe mu matuku atshilualua.” Mfumu Woodrow Wilson wa mu ditunga dia Amerike
...
e bantu mu mushindu kayi? Mumanyi kampanda wa malu a kale wakafunda ne: “Mvita eyi ivua minyange meji ne bikadilu bia bantu.” Bu tshipeta, mvita eyi yakajimija makalenge kampanda. Dishipangana edi divua bu ntuadijilu wa diela mashi a bantu panshi bikole divua bantu kabayi banji kumona. Butomboji buakajuka miaba ya bungi.
Bua tshinyi mvita eyi ivua minyange malu a pa buloba? Nnjiwu minene ivua mienzeke patupu anyi? Mandamuna a nkonko eyi adiku atuambila bualu kampanda bua matuku atshilualua anyi?

NUMONE FILME WA YEHOWA KENA UPUA DINANGA DIENU MUOYO, PASHISHE NUANDAMUNE NKONKO EYI:
Ntatu kayi itu nayi bakulakaje?
Patu muntu ukulakaja utu pa tshibidilu upeta ngikadilu kayi muimpe?
Biwikale mukulakaje, mmunyi mudi mvese eyi ikukankamija? Lewitiki 19:32 ne Nsumuinu 16:31.
Mmunyi mudi Yehowa umona batendeledi bende bakulakaje badi kabatshiyi ne mushindu wa kuyisha bikole?
Yehowa mmusue ne: tuenze tshinyi nansha tuetu bakulakaje?
Bakulakaje badi mua kuambuluisha batshiena bansonga mushindu kayi?
Mmushindu kayi uvua muena Kristo mukulakaje mukukankamije matuku adi panshi aa?

Balayi lukonko ludi ne nomba mufunda kumpala kualu ne maleta mafikisha bua kuambuluisha muntu bua kujingululaye lungenyi lunene.
Nubale tshikoso.
Nubale mvese idi mu maleta maladika, ne wele tukonko ne bukalanga bua kuambuluisha muntu bua amone mudi mvese ayi yandamuna lukonko ludi mu maleta mafikisha.
Koku tshikoso tshikuabu muinshi mua lukonko lumue lumue alu, wambulule bualu 2 ne 3. Bikalaku filme udi upetangana ne lukonko alu mu site wa jw.org, umuele dîba kayi dionso dia panudi munkatshi mua dilonga apu.
Wele muntu lukonko ludi mu maleta mafikisha bua kumanya ni mmumvue lungenyi lunene.

Tshikena kumona tshia ntempelo tshivua Yehezekele mumone tshidi tshileja ne: bantu ba Yehowa bavua mua kufila milambu ku budisuile. Mmunyi mudi yonso wa kutudi mua kufila pende milambu ya kutumbisha nayi Nzambi?—Eb 13:15, 16.
Umue mushindu mutambe buimpe wa kuenza nanku nkulua mpanda-njila muambuluishi. Tshidimu tshia mudimu tshia 2018 tshidi ne ngondo ya bungi idi ne ma Disambombo atanu ne ma Dia lumingu atanu. Ebi nebitambe kuambuluisha bantu badi dîba dionso anu ku midimu ya bianza bua kuyisha nangananga mu Disambombo ne mu Dia lumingu. Kabidi, bamanyishi badi mua kusungula bua kuyisha mêba 30 anyi 50 mu ngondo muisatu ne muinayi ne mu ngondo udibu ne dikumbula dia mutangidi wa tshijengu.
Kadi tuetu katuyi ne mushindu wa kuangata bumpanda-njila buambuluishi? Tudi mua kudienzeja bua kulengeja nyishilu wetu ne pamuapa kuyisha kabidi bikole. Nansha tuetu mu nsombelu kayi, dinanga dietu dia Yehowa didi ditusaka bua kumupesha bintu bimpe bitudi bakokeshe bua tshidimu tshia 2018!—Hos 14:2.
NUMONE FILME WA: YEHOWA YEYE MUNGAMBULUISHE, NDI MUA KUENZA MALU PABUIPI NE ONSO, PASHISHE NUANDAMUNE NKONKO EYI:
Ntshinyi tshidi tshisake Sabina bua kuenzela Yehowa mudimu wa bungi?
Tshilejilu tshia Sabina tshidi tshikukankamija mushindu kayi?
Mu tshidimu tshia mudimu tshia 2018, udi mua kulua mpanda-njila muambuluishi ngondo kayi?

YEZU UDI UFILA DILONGESHA BUA NJIWU IBIDI YA LUFU IVUA MIENZEKE
BADI BONDOPA MAMU UVUA TSHIBOMBO DIA NSABATU
Yezu uvua mudienzeje misangu ya bungi bua kukankamija bantu bua kuikala mu malanda mimpe ne Nzambi. Mpunga mukuabu udi umueneka panyima pa muyuki wabu ne bantu bavua pambelu kua Mufalese.
Bamue ba kudibu badi bakula bua njiwu kampanda ya lufu. Badi bakula bua “bena Galela bavua [nguvena muena Lomo Ponsio] Pilato musambakaje mashi abu ne milambu yabu.” (Luka 13:1) Bavua basue kuamba tshiny
... 
dimu wende wa diyisha, ne udi ufila tshilejilu tshia bualu ebu mushindu eu: “Muntu mukuabu uvua ne mutshi wa mfigi mukuna mu budimi buende bua tumuma tua mvinyo, wakalua kukebaku tumuma, kadi kakasangana nansha kamue. Ke yeye kuambila muena mudimu wa mu budimi bua tumuma tua mvinyo ne: ‘Kukadi bidimu bisatu bindi ndua kukeba tumuma ku mutshi wa mfigi eu, kadi tshiena nsangana nansha kamue to. Uwukose! Bua tshinyi udi ne bua kutungunuka ne kuatula buloba?’ Yeye wakamuandamuna ne: ‘Mfumu, wulekela
...
punda wende ku tshikumbi, uya nende bua kumunuisha mâyi dituku dia Nsabatu anyi? Mukaji eu udi muana wa Abalahama, uvua Satana musuike bidimu 18, kavuaku ne bua kusuludibua ku buloko ebu dituku dia Nsabatu anyi?”—Luka 13:15, 16.
Baluishi bende bakumvua bundu, kadi bantu bakasanka bua malu a kukema avuabu bamone Yezu wenza. Nunku Yezu wakambulula mu Yudaya bilejilu bibidi bia mêyi a buprofete bivua biakula bua Bukalenge, bikavuaye muambe mu buatu pa mbuu wa Galela.—Matayi 13:31-33; Luka 13:18-21.

1. Bua tshinyi mbimpe kufundisha dibaka kua mbulamatadi?
Lumu luimpe ludi lufumina kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa disanka. Mmusue bua mêku onso ikale ne disanka. (1 Timote 1:11) Yeye ke wakafuka dibaka. Bidi bikengela kufundisha dibaka kua mbulamatadi, bua dîku dikale ne disanka. Bualu kuya kua mbulamatadi, nekuambuluishe mulume ne mukaji bua kukolesha bana bimpe, ne bua kudiumvua mu bukubi.
Nzambi utu wangata dibaka mushindu kayi? Utu musue bua mulume ne mukaji bashale mu dibaka bua kashidi. Bena Krist
... 
 ne kunemekangana. Bu mudi balume ne bakaji bonso bikale bena mibi, bobu bamanye mua kufuilangana luse, nebikale ne disanka mu dibaka.

4. Nuenu bana, Nzambi mmusue bua nuikale mushindu kayi?
Yehowa mmusue bua nuikale ne disanka. Mmunupeshe mibelu mimpe ya mushindu wa kuikala ne disanka mu bunsonga buenu. Mmusue bua baledi benu banuambuluishe ne meji ne di
...
mbi, bidi mua kusaka bana benu bua kumunangabu pabu. Wewe ubela muanebe muimanyine pa Dîyi dia Nzambi, udi mua kupeta meji mimpe.
Wewe ukankamija bana bebe ne ubela kalumbandi, nebibambuluishe bikole. Udi kabidi ne bua kubabela ne kubapesha dinyoka. Wewe wenza nunku, neubepule ku malu adi mua kubanyangila disanka. (Nsumuinu 22:15) Kadi, ki mbimpe kubanyoka ne tshikisu to.
Bantemu ba Yehowa batu bapatula mikanda mivule bua kuambuluisha baledi ne bana. Malu adi mu mikanda eyi atu afumina mu Bible.

Bualu bupiabupia mu Tshisangilu tshia munkatshi mua lumingu
Bualu bupiabupia mu Tshisangilu tshia munkatshi mua lumingu
Kutuadijila mu ngondo wa 1 wa 2018, mu tshisangilu tshia munkatshi mua lumingu nemuikale mamanyisha a kudilongela nawu Bible ne bindidimbi ne mêyi makuata bia mu Bible—Nkudimuinu wa bulongolodi bupiabupia (nwtsty) wa kudilongela nende ku Enternete, nansha yeye kayi muanji kuikalaku mu muakulu wenu. Kakuyi mpata, malu aa neakuambuluishe bikole mu dilongolola diebe dia tshisangilu. Kabidi neakusemeje pabuipi menemene ne Yehowa Tatu wetu wa dinanga!

Nsangilu wa buloba bujima (ONU), udi usangisha matunga mapite pa lukama makumi tshitemba ne isatu (193). Nsangilu ewu uvwa mwenza bilondeshila mvita ya buloba bujima miibidi. Kunyima kwa mvita eyi ke kwasabu nsangilu ewu dia 24/10/1945. Kiipatshila kambediambedi ka nsangilu ewu kadi dikeba dia ne bukubi bwa bantu baa buloba bujima. Bwa kufika ku kipatshila aka bidi bikengela dikeba dia bupole, dia bukubi bwa bantu ne nshidimukilu wa buloba bujima. Nsangilu ewu udi ne bukokeshi busunguluke bwa kunyoka matunga menzavi ne kutuma bilwilu bia mvita mu matunga adi ne diapakanyi. Munkatshi mwa nsangilu wa buloba bujima mudi bisumbu bidi bitangila maalu mashilangana : aa londapu, aa baba, aa ba maamu, aa mabanji, aa buledi ne ditebeleela dia bantu…

MULELA MU: 1951
DITUNGA DIABU: ALLEMAGNE
TSHIVUAYE: UVUA NE LUNGENYI LUA DIDISUA NE DIDIENZELA MALU
TSHIMVUA KALE:
Pantshivua muana, dîku dietu divua disombele pabuipi ne Leipzig, ku Est kua Allemagne, pabuipi ne mikalu ya ditunga dia Tchèque ne dia Pologne. Pamvua ne bidimu bisambombo, papa wakaya netu mu ditunga dia Brésil pashishe mu dia Équateur.
Pangakakumbaja bidimu 14, bakantuma mu ditunga dia Allemagne bua kulongelamu. Bu muvua baledi banyi kule, ku Sud kua Amerike, mvua nditangidila mal
... 
wanyi. Ngakalua kusela nsongakaji utuvua tusomba nende, nkavua mulekele dinua dia makanya. (Efeso 5:5) Bu mutuvua balongolole bua kuendakana pa buloba bujima, ngakela meji ne: kudifila mu nsombelu wetu bua kubandila bintu bia dikema bidi Nzambi mufuke, kuvua bushuwa bualu bua mushinga mukole.
Mu bulelela, tshivua musue kushintulula nsombelu wanyi to, nangananga bumuntu buanyi. Bu mumvua ndieyemena ne ndisua bikole, ngakadifila bikole mu mamanya anyi ne mu malu amvua ngenza. Mvua ne nsombelu wa b
...
e udi undombola. (Yeshaya 48:17, 18) Ndi kabidi ne tshipatshila mu nsombelu wanyi tshimvua tshiyi natshi kumpala. Ndi ntendelela Nzambi ne ngambuluisha bantu bakuabu bua kumumanya.
Ditumikila dia mêyi a mu Bible ndikoleshe malanda a mu dibaka dietu. Tuvua kabidi ne diakalenga dia kulela muana wa bakaji muimpe, udi mukole mumanye Yehowa ne mumunange.
Nsombelu wetu kena anu mupepele to. Ku diambuluisha dia Yehowa, tudi badisuike bua kutungunuka ne kumuenzela mudimu ne kumueyemena.—Nsumuinu 3:5, 6.

1, 2. Bena Isalele bavua mu njiwu kayi pavuabu babuela mu buloba bua Sinai mu 1513? Mmushindu kayi wakabakolesha Yehowa ku muoyo?
BENA Isalele bavua mu njiwu pavuabu babuela mu buloba bua Sinai mu 1513 kumpala kua Yezu kuledibua. Bavua ne bua kuenza luendu lukuata buôwa, babitshila mu ‘tshipela tshinene tshibi, tshiakadi ne nyoka isuma bu kapia ne tuminyiminyi.’ (Dutelonome 8:15) Bavua ne bua kubaluisha kabidi kudi bisamba bivua nabu lukuna. Yehowa ke uvua mubafikishe mu nsombelu au. Bu muvuaye 
... 
antu kampanda mu tshishima nanku? Uvua wenza nanku misangu ya bungi anu bua kukuba tshintu kampanda tshia mushinga mukole: dikumbana dia disua diende. Tshilejilu, bivua bikengela bua Yezu kupanduka bua disua dia Nzambi kukumbanadi, bualu ndekelu wa bionso diodi ke diapetesha bantu bonso masanka. Mu Bible mbafundamu bilejilu bia bungi bia muvua Yehowa mukubangane ne bukole buende “bua kutulongesha, bua tupete ditekemena ku diambuluisha dia dinanukila dietu ne dia busambi bua mu Mifundu minsantu.”
...
na kudiye.” (Musambu 18:30) Tudi bumvue ne: katu wenza mudimu ne bukole buende bua kutuepula ku makenga onso mpindieu to. Kadi utu yeye wenza mudimu ne bukole buende misangu yonso bua kukumbaja disua diende. Utu wenza nunku bua kupetesha bantu bende masanka ndekelu wa bionso. Tuetu basemene pabuipi ne Yehowa ne bashale mu dinanga diende, neatupeshe muoyo mupuangane wa kashidi. Bu mutuamanyi bualu ebu, tudi mua kumona dikenga dionso dia mu bulongolodi ebu anu bu “dia tshitupa tshîpi ne dipepele.”

KAKUTU tshintu tshitu tshimueneka katshiyi ne makanda bu muana wa katoto to. Patuakaledibua, baledi betu ke bavua ne mudimu wa kutukuba. Patuakalonga mua kuenda, tuvua tupetangana ne bantu batuvua katuyi bamanye bale menemene bu bantu ba mfiondo. Baledi betu bobu kabayi batukuate ku tshianza, bantu abu bavua batuenza buôwa. Kadi patuvua bakuate ku tshianza tshia maman anyi tshia papa tuakadimvua mu bukubi.
Patuvua bana, bua tuetu kudiumvua mu bukubi bivua bikengela dinanga dia baledi betu ne mal
... 
 wakapanduka, ne imue misangu wakadiumvua mutshioke ne malu. (Musambu 55:3-5; 69:1) Nansha nanku, wakafunda ne: ‘Nendale panshi, nendale tulu mu ditalala kabidi, bualu bua wewe nkayebe, Yehowa, udi umvuijila muaba wa kusomba talalaa.’—Musambu 4:8.
Hana ne Davidi bakapumuina Yehowa ntatu yabu, ne yeye wakabambuluisha (Musambu 55:22) Mmushindu kayi utudi mua kubidikija?
MISHISHINDU ISATU IDI MUA KUTUAMBULUISHA BUA KUDIUMVUA MU BUKUBI
1. Longa mua kueyemena Yehowa bu Tatu.
Yezu wakatulomba bua kuma
...
“Nebashikame, muntu ne muntu muinshi mua muonji wende wa tumuma tua mvinyo ne muinshi mua mutshi wende wa mfigi; kakuena muntu wabakuatshisha buôwa.” (Mika 4:4) Dîba adi muntu nansha umue kakutuenzela bualu bua tudimone katuyi mu bukubi to, muntu nansha umue kakutuenzela bibi to. Too ne tunyinganyinga tukole tua kale ‘katuena tubuela mu mitshima kabidi.’ (Yeshaya 65:17, 25) Nzambi ne muanende Yezu Kristo, nebajadike “buakane.” Nunku ‘nekuikale ditalala ne ditekemena tshiendelele.’—Yeshaya 32:17.

1-3. Ntshinyi tshidi tshitukuate tuetu bonso mu buloko? Mmunyi muatupikula Yehowa?
ELABI meji ne: mbakukosele tshibawu tshia buloko bua matuku ebe onso a muoyo bua bualu buuvua kuyi muenze. Kakuena mushindu wa bobu kukulekela to. Kuena ne ditekemena kampanda bua matuku ebe atshilualua to, ne kuena ne tshiudi mua kuenza bua bualu abu to. RDC: Mulongeshi Désiré Kashmir ni mulombodi Patrick Muyaya benza muyuki bua malu manene a mikenji ya dijitale
Mulongeshi Dr. Désiré Kashmir Eberande Kolongele ne ministre wa diambulula ne bikandakanda Patrick Muyaya bakenza muyuki ne bena tshikandakanda mu dinayi dia matuku dikumi ni isatu ngondo muinayi wa 2023 bua malu manene a mikenji ya dijitale.
Mu muyuki wende wa ntuadijilu, Désiré Kashmir Eberande wakumvuija malu makuabu bu mudi: tshipatshila tshia mukenji eu, muaba udiwu mua kukumbana ne
... 
é Kashmir Eberande wakatumbisha mukanda wa dishintuluka wa mikanda itanu pa kumbusha mukanda wa ntuadijilu.
“Tshia kumpala tshidi tshijadika mikenji idi itangila midimu ya ku Enternete. Tshibidi tshidi tshitangila mikanda, biamu bia ku Enternete ne bantu badibu beyemene. Tshisatu ntshia malu a ku Enternete, ne tshinayi ntshia malu a bukubi ne bukubi bua malu a ku Enternete. Dituku dia ditanu didi diakula bua malu a bungi a tshitupa tshîpi ne a ndekelu”.
Pashishe, ministre wa malu a biamu wakalej
...
e a bukubi bua ditunga, midimu idi mu mudimu wa ditela ne ditangila, wakamba ne: ne mikenji mipiamipia ya bungi, kupenda, kubanda anyi kubanda muntu ne pashishe kumuangalaja pa Enternete, mbualu bua kuleja, kadi mpindieu malu adi enzeka mmakumbanyine mikenji.
Pakakulaye, Patrick Muyaya, ministre wa diumvuangana ne bikandakanda wakela mudimu wa mikenji eyi kalumbandi ne wakaleja ne: mudimu wonso wa mbulamatadi udi ne bua kulondangana ne dienza dia maniskri ne malu makuabu.
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

Mudimue dia matuku dikumi ni isambobo ngondo wa dikumi, bakenza muyuki wa patoke kumpala kua Mfumu wa ditunga Félix Tshisekedi ne balombodi bakuabu ba malu a tshididi ne a mbulamatadi ba mu ditunga edi bua dikumbaja malu adibu balomba kudi mbulamatadi wa ditunga.
Muanda munene uvua muenzeka mû ditunga dia Congo Wa mungalata bilondeshele meyi makulu a ditunga bumudibi bifunda ne « Mu dia matuku dikumi ni itangu ngondo wa dikumi wa tshidimu tshionso, kabadi ka mu ditunga dionso kadi ne «Tshidimu t
... 
a dia kudikanda katshia ngangata mudimu eu wa bukalenge, mu dimuangalaja mu bitupa bionso bia bulumbuluidi, mu didisangisha ne balombodi bonso ba tubadi,
Bamfumu ba mbulamatadi, ba-avoka ne bena dibaka nabu
Wakamba kabidi ne: “Badi mua kutuadija kutuadija kutangila malu a bianza, a bianza ne a mfranga a bena ku tubadi»
Mu tshilumbu tshia dibenga kulumbuluisha balumbuluishi, mulumbuluishi wa kumpala wa Kabadi kakulu wa mu ditunga dia congo udi witaba lungenyi lua kuakajilula kabidi mu nzubu ya di
...
e bua matunga makuabu atuambuluishe ne atuambuluishe mu mvita eyi bua kujikija bipumbishi bidibu bamona bu bualu bunene budi bufikisha ku dipangila didiunda, ne uvua kabidi muleje bualu ebu. Ndi ne dianyisha dia bungi kudi Mfumu wa Tshilumbuluidi
Mfumuende wa ditunga ne Mulumbuluishi Munene, bualu bumfumu buende butambe bunene buvua bumueyemene ne bumupeshe mudimu mukole wa kuakaja nsombelu wa bantu.
Tshifulu tshia buakane tshivuabu banyange munkatshi mua tshisumbu atshi.
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

“Muntu kapanduludi tshidi Nzambi mulamakaje kaba kamue.”—Mâko 10:9
Yehowa udi ulomba yonso wa kutudi bua ‘kunanga lulamatu.’ (Mika 6:8) Bualu ebu budi ne mushinga nangananga mu dibaka diebe, bualu nuenu kanuyi ne lulamatu, kanuakueyemenangana to. Bua dinanga kukola bimpe bikengela kueyemenangana.
Lelu eu, mu mabaka a bungi kamuena lulamatu to. Bua kulama dibaka diebe, udi ne bua kudisuika bua kuenza malu abidi aa:
TEKA DIBAKA DIEBE PA MUABA WA KUMPALA
TSHIDI BIBLE WAMBA: Keba “mua kumanya malu a
... 
nebe to, kadi nudi ne bua kukeba mishindu ya nuenu kusankishangana. (1 Kolinto 10:24) Muena dibaka nebe adimone ne: udi nende dijinga ne udi umuangata ne mushinga.

...

Umvuija bantu bakuabu bimpe ne: udi ne lulamatu lukole kudi muena dibaka nebe

Tutu Mulamba, tshidimu etshi Tshikulengelela.
Tshidimu etshi tshikulengelela ne wewa peba tuasakidila.
Muakunyanyi Katuashi Shambuyi tshidimu etshi tshinulengelela ne mua Mbuyi ne bana bonso.
Wenu Bukonda bueba Mudoyi Shambuyi.
